Zieh dir was an, Mann! Wir tolerieren das hier nicht!（小子，快把衣服穿上，别丢人现眼了！）
Betrunken oder schon verkatert?（脑子还清醒吗？）
Bitte? Was brauchst du?（怎么？有何贵干？）
How can I help you this fine morning?
早安，我有什么能效劳的？
What would you like this fine morning?
What'll it be this fine morning?
Ugh, was ist los?（呃，你想干什么？）
Nackter Kunde, auch ein Kunde!（没穿衣服的顾客也是顾客！）
Willkommen, Herr Nackepo!（欢迎光临，裸男大人！）
Ich habe kein warmes Wasser, Stinktier!
Ich habe kein warmes Wasser, Stinktier!（这可不是洗澡的地方，臭佬！）
Mein Gott! Warum kommst du nackt zu mir? Was willst du?
Mein Gott! Warum kommst du nackt zu mir? Was willst du?（天啊！你的衣服呢？你想干什么？）
Mein Gott! Was willst du diesmal?
Mein Gott! Was willst du diesmal?（天啊，你又想干什么？）
Oh nein, du Bettler…（哦不，又是个乞丐……）
Oh nein... Sie wieder?（哦不……怎么又是你？）
What brauchst du, Fremder？（需要点什么，陌生人？）
Was brauchst du, Nackedei?（买东西吗，裸男？）
Was kann ich dir verkaufen, mein Freund?
What kann ich dir verkaufen, mein Freund?（想买点什么，我的朋友？）
Was machst du hier, du Säufer?
Was machst du hier, du Säufer?（干什么呢，醉鬼？）
Was kann ich dir heute Morgen anbieten?
Was kann ich dir heute Morgen anbieten?（早安，能为你效劳吗？）
Was möchtest du, mein Herr?（你需要什么，先生？）
Was möchtest du, mein Freund?（想买点什么，朋友？）
Wie kann ich dir Säufer helfen?
Wie kann ich dir Säufer helfen?（有什么需要吗，酒鬼？）
Was suchst du? Das ist kein Badehaus, Dreckskerl!
Was suchst du? Das ist kein Badehaus, Dreckskerl!（走错门了吧？蠢货，这可不是澡堂！）
Was willst du, Herr Flasche?（想买点什么，酒鬼？）

Wie kann ich dir helfen, mein Freund?（能为你效劳吗，朋友？）
Isn't it a sin to walk around naked like that, friend?
朋友，你这样四处裸奔，难道不是一种罪过吗？
Damn it, lad! Do you really have to walk around naked like that?!
妈的，小伙子！你非得这样四处裸奔吗？！
Mi del tuke o Del. Lači rat.
Mi del tuke o Del. Laci rat.
My God! We've got some kind of naked madman here!
我的天哪！这里有个裸体的疯子！
Isn't it a sin, walking around naked like that, friend?
朋友，你这样四处裸奔，难道不是一种罪过吗？
I'll deal with that bastard for you!
Now you'll see that crime doesn't pay!
现在你知道犯罪没有好下场了吧！
Either I will be standing by them, or my horse Tooth will be looking at them hungrily.
我会看管它们的，或者由我的马，牙（Tooth)，看守它们。
It is always gadjo that bring them, after all.
毕竟，它们都是被gadjo（外来人）带到这里来的。
You fucked up like wild boar! I only got one left, so spare it, do piče!
你像野猪一样把事情搞砸了！我只剩一个了，你省着点，do pice（该死）！
He was like brother to me. Do piče!
他就像我的兄弟。Do pice（他妈的）!
Do piče, what you doing?! Try sober up, or we fucked!
Do pice（该死），你在做什么？！清醒一下，否则我们就完蛋了！
Do piče drevenej! Never mind who go first, we go!
Do pice drevenej（去你妈的）！别管谁先来，我们一起上！
Ech do piče, do zajebanej piče...
Ech do pice, do zajebanej pice...
Do piče, save breath and push!
Do pice（他妈的），省口气，用力！
Don't fuck with torch, hey!? Put it away, do piče!
别他妈拿着火炬了？！把它收起来吧，do pice（他妈的）！
来自Keseloko（克塞洛克）的Trencsén（特伦奇因）。
Stuffed? Do piče! What am I, apothecary? I got nothing left for you. You find another way!
吃撑了？Do pice（该死）！我是什么，药剂师吗？我帮不了你。你另想办法吧！
Do piče, this fellah a fucking bull!
Do pice（去他妈的），这家伙简直像牛一样倔！
Well, I've seen some Cumans hanging around the Rocktower Pond. I think they joined forces with that nomad vermin.
嗯，我看到有一些库曼人在石塔池塘边出没。我认为他们和那些游牧民歹徒厮混在一起。
Excellent. So the matter is resolved, but if anything like this happens again, it will be the pillory for you! Alles klar?!
很好。那么这件事就解决了，但如果再有类似的事情发生，你会被拷上颈手枷！Alles klar（好吗）？！
Hmm… Your journey ends here, Jan.
嗯…你的旅程到此为止，约翰。
It just didn't work out. You're not exactly gyönyörű.
只是没有成功而已。你并不算特别gyönyöru（漂亮）。
His uncle is the brave knight… eh... Alberich von...
他的叔叔是勇敢的骑士…呃…阿尔贝里奇·冯…
Well, you know… You were together… alone somewhere… No Cumans, no nomads… no clothes…
嗯，你懂的…你们在某处…单独在一起…周围没有库曼人，没有游牧民…没有衣服…
Hé! Majd én megmutatom neked!（嘿！我要给你点颜色瞧瞧！）
Eh! Mondtad neki vagy sem?（怎么样？跟她说了没有？）
Mit mondtál neki?（你跟她说了什么？）
Mi van? Mit csináltál?（怎么了？你跟她说了些什么？）
Mi van? Mi történik?（怎么了？出什么事了？）
Miért egyeztem bele ebbe…（我真后悔来这么一趟……）
Mit bámulsz rám?（你看我干什么？）
Csak nem mondtál neki valami hülyeséget? No, várj csak!
Csak nem mondtál neki valami hülyeséget? No, várj csak!（你该不会跟她说了什么不该说的吧？你给我等着！）
Fuck courtesy! To the pillory with them!
去他妈的礼节！把他们拷上颈手枷！
Ez egy őrült! Meg fog fulladni!
Ez egy orult! Meg fog fulladni!（找死的疯子！非淹死不可！）
Kaj tuke o kar te kirňol!
Kaj tuke o kar te kirnol（你要做什么）！
Really? Poor thing, you almost ruined it for him, you oaf!
真的吗？可怜的家伙，你差点就毁了他的表白，你这个蠢货！
And with you, Henry of Skalitz. Take care.
也与你同在，斯卡里茨的亨利。保重。
We are lodging in the Schenke Kaiser Karl, not far from here on Merchants' Straße.
我们就住在Schenke Kaiser Karl（查理皇帝酒馆），就在离这里不远的Merchants' Straße（商人街）上。
Henry of Skalitz! I can't believe it myself, he's beaten the Lord of Garbow!
斯卡里茨的亨利！我自己都不敢相信，他竟然打败了加博的领主！
Henry of Skalitz! Unbelievable, God must have guided his hand!
斯卡里茨的亨利！难以置信，一定是上帝在指引他的手！
Henry of Skalitz! He's defeated his rival with an incredible performance!
斯卡里茨的亨利！他以惊人的表现击败了对手！
Today, we will witness a duel between Sir Zavish of Garbow, called "the Black" and Henry of Skalitz!
今天，我们将见证人称“黑衣人”的加博的扎维什爵士和斯卡里茨的亨利之间的决斗！
But his swindling days are over! A long stretch in the pillory awaits him!
但他坑蒙拐骗的日子到头了！等着上颈手枷上烂掉吧！
He'll be whipped for his lewd acts and be left to suffer in the pillory for several days.
他将会因他的猥琐行为被施以鞭刑，并关进颈手枷里受刑数日。
你最好和司令官谈谈，gadjo（外来人）……
Cumans? I don't know where they might be, but I hear they made friends with the Rocktower nomads.
库曼人？我不知道他们可能在哪里，但我听说他们和那些石塔游牧民有些交情。
The Cumans? Better not get tangled up with them… All I know is they're on good terms with those nomads.
库曼人？最好不要和他们扯上关系…我只知道他们与那些游牧民关系不错。
The Cumans? What do you want with them? I don't know where they are, but I know they're on good terms with those damned nomads!
库曼人？你找他们做什么？我不知道他们在哪里，只知道他们和那些该死的游牧民关系不错！
Where can I find this shepherd?
我在哪能找到这位牧羊人呢？
And it was the herdsboy who saw it by the cross? Or someone else?
是那个牧羊人在十字架旁看到的？还是别的什么人？
Where can I find the herdsboy?
Does it matter? I hope the pillory taught you a lesson!
这有什么关系吗？我希望颈手枷能给你教训！
Stanislav, the herdsboy, he comes running into the village that night all terrified, saying he'd seen a rider from hell in Apollonia.
牧羊人斯坦尼斯拉夫，那天晚上惊慌地跑进村子，说他在阿波罗尼亚看到了一个来自地狱的骑手。
You're Henry from Skalitz, aren't you? I've heard a lot about you and your fists.
你是来自斯卡里茨的亨利，对吧？我听说过许多你打架的事迹。
Just the other day, a shepherd boy from Kopanina complained that his sheep were being eaten by the flea ridden beasts!
就几天前，有个从科帕尼那来的牧羊人还在抱怨，说他的羊被满身跳蚤的野兽吃掉了！
我能向你打听一下路吗？
The hand cannons are somewhere there?
手铳会在那边的什么地方吗？
Could you explain to me where we are?
能向我解释一下我们在哪里吗？
Ergo… bimbos! No! Ergo bib… bibamus… ty vole… pičo!
Ergo… bimbos! No! Ergo bib… bibamus… ty vole… pico!
I'd like to know where this is here.
Could you show me where we are?
请问，你能帮我指一下现在的位置吗？
Could you tell me where we are?
Could you tell me where we are?
I found them! I've got the hand cannons!
我找到了！我拿到手铳了！
I'll take powder and some shot. That should wreak havoc in the trenches.
我需要火药和一些子弹，好把他们的战壕炸个稀巴烂。
I found the white roebuck's hide.
I'm a bit lost. Do you know where we are?
我有点迷路了，你知道我们这是在哪吗？
You did all you could. Zizka gave us a job to do, and we did it.
你已经尽力了。这是杰式卡给我们的任务，而我们也完成了。
Can I ask you for directions?
Mind pointing out where we are?
能不能帮我指一下，我们这是在哪个位置？
To hell with the hand cannons. Don't you want to get on the road and sing to the convoy?
让那些手铳见鬼去吧。你不想上路并唱歌给车队听吗？
I got a bit lost. Could you tell me where exactly this is?
我有点迷路了。你能告诉我这是哪里吗？
Seriously, Henry. Don't be a fool. It's not worth it. There's no point in risking your neck now that everything's over and we can finally live! Please.
说真的，亨利。别傻了，现在一切都过去了，我们可以好好活着了。求你别再拿你的脖子去冒险了，这不值得。
Oh Jesus…! it has to be even.
But when I say evenly, I mean it. A sword has two sides, like a lot of other things. Including myself…
但我说了要均匀地打，这不是开玩笑。一把剑有两面，很多东西都一样。包括我自己…
Now you can go straight to the anvil.
现在把剑转移到铁砧那边去。
See the sparks? That's the sign of a good strike. The more sparks, the better.
瞧见那些火星了吗？这才能说明敲击到位了，火星越多，打得越好！
Christ! Look, we just tried this. Just poke it back and forth and heat up the whole sword.
天哪！看，我们刚做过这一步。就这么来回移动，把整个剑身烧热。
The closer it is to being finished, the more it will take on the shape you want.
等它越来越接近你想要的形状，就差不多算完工了。
Bloody hell! What's the hold up? I've shown you this part already.
该死！犹豫什么呢？这个步骤我已经给你示范过了。
What's the matter with you, Henry?! You can't forge anything in a cold furnace!
亨利，你怎么回事？！冷的熔炉能锻出什么东西来？
That's some nice whistling! It's easier to forge to a rhythm, isn't it?
你这口哨吹得不错！跟着节奏锻造就轻松些，对吧？
Move it, you're standing there like a fencepost! You call this working?
动起来啊，你站在那里就像一根篱笆！你把这叫干活？
Hurry it up, Henry… no slacking. We've got a lot of work to do.
快点，亨利…不要偷懒。我们有很多事儿要做。
You've got to hammer the workpiece evenly. One hit next to the other.
你得均匀地锤打工件。一下接一下。
Bloody hell, Henry! I've got other work to do, and if you can't manage this, I don't know what to do with you.
见鬼，亨利！我还有其他工作要做，要是你这都搞不定，我真不知道该拿你怎么办了。
Henry, when you've got a workpiece heated up, you can't just stand there and gape at it!
亨利，工件加热了，别站那儿发呆啊！
Henry… take a look at the sword up close. Don't worry, you won't burn yourself.
亨利…仔细看看这把剑。别担心，不会烫伤你的。
Henry, stop gaping into the fire like a fortune teller and heat it up.
亨利，别像个算命先生那样盯着火发呆，赶紧加热。
Henry! What are you waiting for?!
You'll never finish it like this.
这样下去你这辈子都打不成东西。
Get a move on, I'd like to get some other things done today.
快点，我今天还有别的事要干呢。
There's a lever above you. Give it a pull, it works the bellows.
你头边有一个控制杆。拉一下，风箱就能工作了。
Sometimes you've got to go there and back all day, but it's all part of the craft.
有时像这样拿进拿出的，得持续一整天，但这都是这门手艺的一部分。
Some things like swords are too long to fit in the fire. You have to heat it up bit by bit.
像剑一类的武器，器身很长，没法整个受热。你得一点一点加热。
Hurry up now…! it's cooling and you're not doing anything.
快一点啊…！工件都快冷却了，你一锤还没下呢。
Come on, Henry, I don't have all day. Back and forth. You know that movement, surely?
拜托，亨利，别浪费时间。来回加热。你知道该怎么做吧？
See, it's the colour of straw, which is what you want. And you heated the whole thing up. Nicely done!
看到了吗，要的就是这种稻草色。而且你也把整把剑加热得够烫，做得很好！
The furnace is cold now, give it a practice try.
熔炉现在是冷了，正好来练练手。
So what then? If you can't handle it, I'll have you make nails instead.
怎么回事？你要是搞不定，就改打钉子去吧。
Of course, if it was all about hitting an anvil with a hammer, any dolt could do it.
当然，如果只是用锤子锤打铁砧，傻瓜都能做到。
A stronger hit will do more, but it'll tire you out faster.
重击会更加有效，但也更消耗体力。
God's wounds, lad, what's wrong with you!? You're standing there like a fencepost, you've got to move it around… back and forth.
上帝啊，小伙子，你是怎么了！？站那儿像根篱笆似的 ，你得不停移动它…来回移动。
Just hit it… bang… bang… bang!
Nice! Now try forging it on both sides.
很好！现在试着把它正反面都锤打一遍。
Well, what's the holdup? Give it a try… Hit it a few times… Go for it!
好吧，等什么呢？动手试试…锤打几下…来！
What is it? Look, if you're tired, I don't think this is for you.
怎么了？听着，要是这种程度就累了，这活就不适合你。
What is it, Henry? Take a closer look.
怎么样了，亨利？检查剑身啊。
So come over to the anvil.
把剑转移到铁砧那里去。
So come over to the anvil.
把它转移到铁砧那儿去。
Try poking it around for a bit.
Now heat up the whole thing.
Turn it over and continue on the other side.
把它翻过来，继续锤打另一面。
All that's left is to temper it, and the sword will be done! The rest is just tweaking.
只剩下淬火，这把剑就做好了！接下来只有一些微调！
It's cooled now. You can't do it all in one go. You've got to put it back in the furnace from time to time.
现在剑身已经冷却了。你别指望一次做好，得时不时地把它放回熔炉里。
Damn it, what's taking you so long? You just have to heat up the whole thing.
该死，怎么花了这么长时间？你只需要把整个工件加热就可以了。
The whole thing is heated up now.
The whole thing is heated up now.
Now take the hammer and try hitting it a few times.
拿起锤子，试着敲打几下。
You can tell the temperature by the colour. But you won't be able to tell when it's in the fire, you have to take it out from time to time and take a look. Try it out.
你可以通过颜色来判断温度。但当工件在火中时就看不清楚，得不时地把它拿出来看一看。试试吧。
Now get the furnace nice and hot.
Try giving it a few blows, as hard as you can… So I can see how strong you are.
试着敲打几下，尽量用力…让我看看你劲儿多大。
Try moving the sword along the anvil, so you get the hang of it.
试着把剑沿着铁砧移动，这样你慢慢就上手了。
If you find that white hide at their camp and bring it to me, I'll pay you more than that pinch-purse of a huntsman.
如果你在他们的营地里发现了白色兽皮，把它带给我。我会付给你更高的价钱，比那个吝啬猎人的出价高多了。
First things first. I'm Henry. From Skalitz.
重要的事说在前头，我叫亨利，来自斯卡里茨。
You mean what sort of skills can one pick up in a cemetery?
你觉得一个人在墓园里待着能学到什么技能呢？
I'm here on behalf of his brother, Jan. He came with the ransom to get him back.
我是代表他弟弟扬来的。他带着赎金要赎他回去。
And now I'll smash your other arm!
接下来我要把你另一只手也打烂！
Beten und sterben. (留下你的遗言吧！）
My God, you're some fuckers! All ganging up on one man?!
靠，你们这帮孙子！一群人欺负一个？！
血溅四方了吧，你这个废物？！
What's it to be, you wretch?!
You're going to fuck with us?!
What, all at the same time?!
The next blow will send you to hell!
下一击就把你送入地狱！
Es gehören immer zwei dazu … （现在你连手都没了，废了吧...）
Ha! Now you're sweating blood, you shit!
哈！血流不止了吧，你个混蛋！
Heh! Now it's your turn, you shit!
哼！该你上场了，你个废物！
Ich mache dich gerne fertig! （杀掉你真是太爽了！）
Ich werde dich zerstückeln! （我要把你剁成肉酱！）
Ihr seid verdammte Feiglinge! (你们这些操蛋的懦夫！）
I'll hammer some manners into you!
我会把做人的规矩敲进你的脑袋！
Go at him from the right!
If you keep resisting, I've all the right in the world to execute you on the spot!
再负隅顽抗，现在就把你就地正法了！
The executioner is sharpening his axe for you!
刽子手磨着斧子准备砍你的头！
None of you would have a chance alone, eh?
Komm, wir schießen dich ab. （来啊，我给你一次机会。）
Fuck! Now you're for it, you shit!
Los geht’s! Du kriegst Ärger, Arschloch.
Los geht’s! Du kriegst Ärger, Arschloch. （来啊！你会遭报应的，混蛋！）
Los, schlagen wir ihm die Fresse ein!
Los, schlagen wir ihm die Fresse ein! （上，揍扁他！）
Haven't you had enough? I'll kill you on the spot if you don't yield!
还没吃够苦头？再不认怂，立马送你上路！
You should have yielded! Now we'll display your corpse on the pillory!
你应该投降的！现在我们要在颈手枷上把你曝尸街头！
Na los, komm schon.（来吧，快啊。）
Na los! Was gibt’s? （来啊！怎么了？）
You shouldn't have fucked with us, you bastard!
你不该招惹我们的，你这个杂碎！
Don't think I won't cut you to pieces!
别以为我不敢把你切成碎片！
让我们终结这一切，你个混蛋！
Viel Spaß in der Hölle … （替我像撒旦问好…)
Scheiß auf den Scheiß! （我是你就不会这么做！）
You don't fight with guards, you fool! You surrender to them!
你个蠢货！和警卫打什么！你该向他们投降！
I'll be done with you in a flash!
我眨眼的功夫就能干掉你！
To hell with you, you scum!
You'll get such a blow that you'll wake up in the pillory!
你会受到重击，然后在颈手枷上里醒来！
The pillory's too good for you! I'll chop you up on the spot!
你连颈手枷都不用上了！我要把你当场剁了！
Now we'll have you, you scum!
这下轮到我们收拾你了，人渣！
现在我们来终结这一切！
Now you'll see what we do with criminals, bastard!
现在你见识到罪犯的下场了，杂碎！
This won't end well for you!
Punishment by the blade! My favourite!
You won't be needing that arm now, eh?
反正你也用不上那条胳膊了，不是吗？
Also was soll das werden? （好吧，所以现在呢？）
Wie auch immer, Arschloch. （那如你所愿，蠢猪。）
I'll whip your arse so much you'll be looking forward to the cane!
我会抽烂你的屁股，让你求着挨棍子！
I want to hear it, Kozliek!
Welded Spanish steel? There's nothing better for a sword!
西班牙焊接钢？那是最适合铸剑的材质！
I'd like to know where you're going to get your hands on some welded steel?
我想知道你打算从哪里获得焊接钢？
You know… I've been through something similar. Sigismund's army burned down my home town, Skalitz.
你知道吗…我也经历过类似的磨难。西格斯蒙德的军队也曾把我的家乡斯卡里茨给焚烧殆尽了。
Rat said he was trying to creep into the camp, but you know what Rat's like.
老鼠说他试图潜入军营，但你知道老鼠这个人的德性。
In the end, I challenged him to a duel. We wagered our honour, our armour and our horses.
最后，我向他提出了决斗的挑战。我们用各自的荣誉、盔甲和马匹做赌注。
That's exactly what I'm going to do! Lord Christ, grant me the strength to succeed!
我正打算这么做！主啊，赐予我降服邪祟的力量！
God help me, my bodyguard is a monk... who can’t speak Latin!
天哪，我的护卫竟然是个油盐不进的修士，还是个不会说拉丁语的修士！
Hmm. This would be perfect for Kozliek and Mikesh. The scrapes those two have survived are almost unbelievable.
嗯，米凯什和科兹里克很适合干这件事。这两人遭遇的磨难简直难以置信。
Godspeed, Sir Jan! Have a safe journey!
一切顺利，扬爵士！一路平安！
I'm sorry, Sir Jan, but this goes far beyond the work of a messenger.
对不起，扬爵士。但我只是个信使，打斗这跟我没关系。
We know what happened to Peter. You wanted to use me and cheat Jan.
我们知道彼得怎么了。你想利用我，欺骗扬。
And with you. I'm Jan of Suchotlesky.
上帝也与你同在。我是苏霍茨基的扬。
I'm Jan… Sir Jan of Suchotlesky.
I am… Sir Jan of Suchotlesky. And you?
我是……苏霍茨基的扬爵士。你是谁？
I'm pleased to meet you, Henry. I'm Jan of Suchotlesky.
很高兴见到你，亨利。我是苏霍茨基的扬。
Just between us, boy, my men will let you live if you promise not to protect Sir Jan.
孩子，悄悄告诉你，如果你保证不保护扬爵士，我的人就会放你一马。
I will give you a choice. Either you take the bit of sense that you have into your hand, and kill Jan yourself, or you will die… all of you.
我将给你们一个选择。要么理智一点，亲手杀了扬，要么就去死......你们所有人。
Even that little messenger of yours has better manners than you, Sir Jan.
即使是那个小信使也比你有礼貌，扬爵士。
Well, well. Sir Jan, perhaps we can strike a deal.
好吧，好吧，好吧。扬爵士，也许我们可以达成一个交易...
Sir Jan, my patience has run out. Either you will pay the ransom in full or you will join your brother.
扬爵士，我没耐心了。要么你全额支付赎金，要么你就去见你哥哥。
Tread lightly with the insults, Sir Jan! My men will not tolerate their commander being insulted.
不要侮辱人，扬爵士！我的人不会容忍他们的指挥官受侮辱。
The thing is though, Sir Jan, I did not kill him.
但问题是，扬爵士，我并没有杀他。
Kill Jan, and we will let you go! And not empty-handed…
杀了扬，我们就会放你走！而且你不会空手而归...
At least Jan is alright. Thanks for the help.
至少扬没事。谢谢你的帮助。
Why not? We don't usually allow strangers up there, but after all, you did a good deed. Follow me.
那就来吧，我们通常不允许游牧民上去，但毕竟你做了一件好事。跟我来吧。
Nem értesz engem, ugye?（你什么也听不懂吧？）
Borzasztóan nevetségesen hangzik a beszédetek. Inkább fogd be a szád!
Borzasztóan nevetségesen hangzik a beszédetek. Inkább fogd be a szád!（你们的语言听起来很蠢，闭嘴吧！）
Ha zavarba hozol elotte, megkeserulod!（要是让我在她面前出洋相，小心我对你不客气！）
I also know how to deal with dogs. Linhart the cobbler will tell you some secrets of his trade too if you want.
我还清楚怎么对付狗。鞋匠林哈特也可以告诉你一些他们行当的秘密，如果你想知道的话。
And we split money. Az nagyszerű!
然后我们分钱，Az nagyszeru（太棒了）！
And... it looks like it wants me to follow it...
而且……看起来它想让我跟它走……
I want it to be known that Henry of Skalitz defeated you.
我想让大家知道，斯卡里茨的亨利打败了你。
I'd like to get better with a sabre. Do you have any advice for me?
我想精进一下用军刀的技巧。你有什么好的建议吗？
I brought you the hunting sword.
Sure thing. I can get started right away.
Jan's not going to like this.
The herdsboy wasn't lying. And you don't smell of brimstone. You're just an ordinary horse.
那个牧羊人没有说谎。而且你身上没有硫磺的味道，你只是一匹普通的马。
I could use some of these myself.
No, it's not hard, but it takes a long time and that's something I don't have a lot of right now…
对，这不难，但挺费功夫的，我可没那么多时间……
We'll get to work straight away, alright?
The lords are playing soldiers, and it's the ordinary folks that suffer. Just like in Skalitz.
战争不过是领主们的游戏，而遭殃的都是平民百姓，就像之前斯卡里茨发生的一样。
A horseshoe from the ghost horse, exactly like the executioner wanted me to get. Well... almost exactly.
一块幽灵马的马蹄铁，正是刽子手让我找的东西。嗯……算是吧。
May God grant you peace, Sir Jan. In death, at least.
愿上帝至少在死后赐予你安宁，扬爵士。
A damaged statuette of St. Mary Magdalene. Certainly stolen.
还有一尊损坏的马格达莱妮圣玛利亚的雕像，肯定是偷来的。
God's wounds, the horse! It really is here!
天啊，是幽灵马！它真的存在！
They say the spectral horse appears here at midnight. Well, we’ll see…
听说幽灵马午夜会出现在这儿。嗯，拭目以待吧……
I'm here, then. You said in the alehouse that you could do with a helping hand at the forge, didn't you?
我来了。你在酒馆里说，铁匠铺需要帮手，对吗？
A strange horseshoe. And these spikes… So the horse doesn't slip on wet ground. Clever.
这马蹄铁可真够奇特的，上面还有些刺……这样马在湿地上跑起来就不会打滑了，真是巧妙。
So this is where the horse led me?
这匹马是想带我来这里？
That poor dead soul must be his master. Even in death, he didn’t want to leave him...
那可怜的死者一定是它的主人。即使主人死后，这匹马也不愿离开……
Those are odd horseshoes. They don't seem magical, but those spikes look useful.
好奇怪的马蹄铁。看起来不像有魔力，但上面的刺应该有些作用。
Jan's not going to be happy about this…
Your master is in a better place now, horsey. But what do you say we ride over to the horse dealer, and I’ll claim you for myself?
你的主人去过更幸福的生活了，马儿。不过我说，我把你骑到马商那儿，然后占为己有怎么样？
I could take them straight to Janek, or forge a completely new set for him.
我可以直接把它们带给雅内克，或者给他打一套新的。
The herdsboy was right! I actually found that black horse.
那个牧羊人说得没错！我真的找到了那匹黑马。
Hmm… That herdsboy really did see something... And the trail leads into the rocks.
嗯…...那个牧羊人真的看到了什么…...而那条小路通往岩石。
On your way! And remember what happened here, and that you owe your lives to Henry of Skalitz!
走吧！记住这里发生的事情，你们欠斯卡里茨的亨利一条命！
You hear that, you rabble?! Go! And remember you owe your miserable lives to Henry of Skalitz!
听到了吗，你们这些乌合之众？快滚！记住，你们这些可怜虫欠斯卡里茨的亨利一条命！
You won't catch me in deep water again. My shoulder still hurts from the last time.
我不会再进深水区一步了，我的肩膀现在还在疼呢。
Ow, that's what comes from bending badly!
哎哟，这就是弯腰不注意的后果啊！
Christ! I've really done my back in!
天呐！我的背真的扭到了！
I can hardly straighten up. Ow!
我几乎直不起身来了。哎哟！
Never again! I tried swimming once and how did that end up?
我再也不游了！之前试过一次，你猜我有多惨？
But if you don't have your own stuff, you can get everything from the chest in my forge.
要是手头没有材料，可以去铁匠铺箱子里去拿，啥都有。
For the nobility, eh? Well, that kind of experience would come in very handy for me indeed.
给贵族铸剑，嗯？好吧，这种经验对我来说可太有用了。
I could. My last two hands, well… they're not worth mentioning. And what with the wedding coming up, the work is piling up... ahh..?
我需要人手。之前的两个帮手，算了…不提他们也罢。还有，婚礼快到了，工作也堆积如山…，啊…？
As it happens, I have to forge a wedding present for young Lord Semine. A fine sword.
这么巧，我得为塞米少主锻造一把好剑，作为他的结婚礼物。
Aye, I could, but it's the middle of the night for Christ's sake!
对，没错，但现在他妈的可是大半夜啊！
You should know, Henry, that blacksmithing isn't for everyone. Have you done it before?
你知道，亨利，人可不是长了胳膊就会打铁。你以前干过这个吗？
You could forge me a hunting sword as a test, so I can see if you can make a straight blade. That shouldn't give you much trouble if your father was a swordsmith, should it?
你先打把猎刀试试，让我看看你打的剑直不直。你爹是铸剑师的话，这点小事儿应该难不倒你吧？
Hold your horses! I'll have to try you out first.
慢着！我得先试试你行不行。
It shouldn't be hard for you to forge a hunting sword for me as a test, should it?
你先给我打把猎刀试试手，应该不难吧？
Come back during the day when I'm at work.
等我白天上工的时候再来吧！
Great! Find some iron and get started, then.
很好！去找一些铁，然后开工！
That's true. My last two hands… well, not worth talking about.
没错。之前的两个帮手…算了，不提也罢。
Is that right? You know what? Come back when you're serious about the job…
是吗？这样吧，等你真想要这份工作的时候再来吧…
You said something in the tavern about being a blacksmith's son, didn't you?
你在酒馆说过，你是一个铁匠的儿子，对吧？
Stop by during the day, when I'm working!
等我白天上工的时候再来吧！
I was just about to start work on a sword.
You're lucky then. These days, they'll clap you in the pillory even if you're innocent.
那你真走运。如今，就算你是无辜的，他们也会给你戴上颈手枷。
Some kind of moonshine? A sip of that can do miracles.
某种私酒？抿一口就能创造奇迹。
I think it's some Jan Sokol... of Lamberg?
我认为是兰贝格……的扬·索科尔？
Enough about Zizka. I also heard something about a pillory and poaching. What the hell did you and Sir Hans get up to?
我们就不谈杰式卡了。我还听说了一些关于颈手枷和偷猎的事情。你和汉斯大人究竟闹出了什么事？
Let's move on. I heard something about a pillory and poaching. What in God's name did you and Sir Hans get up to?
我们继续吧。我听说了一些关于颈手枷和偷猎的事情。你和汉斯大人究竟闹出了什么事？
Jan went straight into the lion's den. He knew the risks.
扬直接进入了虎穴。他知道那里的风险。
You regard the pillory as just a bit of trouble? You must live a most unusual life.
你认为被锁进颈手枷只是一点麻烦？你一定过着极不寻常的生活。
Burn down two of Sigismund's villages for every one of ours he burned down. And a dozen for Skalitz!
他烧掉我们的一个村，我们就烧掉西格斯蒙德的两个庄。还要烧毁他十来个村庄为斯卡里茨复仇！
A mace or any old bludgeon.
一把钉头锤或者任何一根旧棍棒。
Maybe there's another reason. The miners in Skalitz use to say where there's sulphur, it's easier to breathe. Healthier air.
也许还有别的原因。斯卡里茨的矿工常说，有硫磺的地方，空气更好。更健康。
I have to say, I uh... I didn't expect that. You're right, it has a real… bite to it.
我不得不说，超出我的预期。你说得没错，它有一股真正的…浓香。
Do you know Kozliek? A clever little fellah. Surely he managed to get out alive?
你认识科兹里克吗？一个聪明的小家伙。他肯定活了下来吧？
But thank you... For those kind words and the brooch you gave me.
但要谢谢你…谢谢你给我的鼓励和送我的别针。
A hunting crossbow. I even think it's von Bergow's!
一把狩猎用的弩。我甚至认为它属于冯·波尔高！
Lo! The worth Henry of Skalitz!
看！尊贵的斯卡里茨的亨利！
Sorry, I forgot the great Jan Zizka always has to be a hero, even if it costs him his life.
抱歉，我忘了伟大的扬·杰式卡就算赔上性命，也一定要逞英雄。
In Silver Skalitz, they say! Without warning, attacked by Cuman troops!
他们说，白银斯卡里茨猝不及防地被库曼人军队袭击了！
Except someone saved us the work and the hand cannons are not here anyway. We must look elsewhere.
只是有人替我们节省了精力，手铳不在这里了。我们必须找找其他地方。
I thought I'd be in the pillory by now.
我还以为我现在会被关进颈手枷呢。
If Loudyil is here, then I reckon I know where the hand cannons are.
如果劳迪尔埋在这里，那么我想我知道手铳在哪里了。
It's not my fault he has a loose woman. If not me then she'd be fooling around with someone else.
她老婆是个水性扬花的女人，遇上这种人又不是我的问题。就算不是我，她也会找上别人的。
Well, books... learning. All sorts of different kinds... some with pictures.
嗯，书…学习。各种各样…有些还有图画。
Ha!- Lache e e e e s!
Ha!- Lache e e e e s!
What else should I have done? It felt more like you were hitting me with a mace than your bare hands!
不然我还能干嘛？你打到我身上的每一记拳头都让我感觉自己在被钉头锤敲打！
Aye, but I'm the one that got run out of Troskowitz! Then from Tachov, Mladyeov, and Aujezd too…
是的，但是我却成了那个逃离特罗斯科维茨的人！还逃出过塔霍夫和姆拉得伊沃夫，包括乌杰兹德也是…
That gadjo is playing circles around me!
那个gadjo（外来人）正在忽悠我！
I'll show you how to play, gadja!
我来教你怎么玩，gadjo（外来人）！
What can I do with the items I've forged?
我锻造出来的物品能做什么用？
Just like that? You aren't going to help me?
这就开工？你不打算帮我？
I'm still not really sure of myself in the forge. Could you show me again how it's done?
在锻造方面，我还没有什么把握。你能再给我示范一遍操作吗？
Once you've made some coin and feel like being out in the open again, I'll give you… some more interesting work.
等你赚到些钱，想出去闯闯的时候，我再给你…安排点更有意思的活儿。
It's all about making sure every strike does its job.
关键在于你的每一锤都要打到位。
But if you want to make a fancy sword with lots of ornamentation, you'll have to look elsewhere.
但要想锻造一把华丽的长剑，就得到别处去找材料了。
Why don't you forge me another hunting sword? Have you got what you need?
你再给我锻造一把猎刀怎么样？你找到需要的材料了吗？
Hear that? Besides the sparks, you can tell a good strike by the sound it makes.
听到了吗？除了火星飞溅，也可以从清脆的声响听出锤打很到位。
Hmm, very nice work! Your father taught you the trade well!
嗯，活干得真棒！你父亲教得不错啊！
You can sleep in the chamber by the woodshed. And there's a chest where you can keep your things.
你可以睡在柴房旁边的房间里。那里有一个箱子，你可以用来存放行李。
Now I've got a piece of advice for you - hammer to a rhythm. When I hammer a piece to a beat, the work goes by easier.
给你个建议——跟着节奏打。随着节奏打铁，活儿干得就轻松多了。
Got that? Or is there something else you want to ask about?
明白了吗？还有什么要问的？
If you carry on hammering as well as you did today, you've definitely got a job here. Even so, keep in mind…
你要是能一直像今天这样好好打铁，肯定能在这儿混口饭吃。不过，记好了…
If you work evenly, each strike falling right next to the last one, you can't go wrong.
要是打得均匀，一下接着一下，就不会出错。
I'll be happy to sell you something if you want...
需要的话，我很乐意卖一些材料给你…
Well, I've seen better blades, but it's not complete rubbish. I could give you a chance. Even so, keep in mind…
呃，这玩意儿不是我见过最差的剑，凑合能用。我可以给你个机会，不过，记住了…
Well… you can sell them. Though you probably won't have much luck around here. But I'll happily buy some of the nicer things from you.
嗯…你可以卖掉它们。不过这儿估计没啥市场。但我乐意买一些你的好货。
You can get down to it right away.
Why not? Better to practise now than fuck up an order…
当然可以。现在练练手，总比搞砸一个订单要好…
Then get it, alright? What are you waiting for?
快拿材料去吧？还愣着干什么？
Well, I'm beside myself with joy that you decided to show up. But I'd be even happier if you came during the day.
好吧，你总算来了，这不错。要是能在白天来，就更好了。
You take care of these smaller jobs. Forge away as long as you're able and then sell it all.
这些零碎活儿交给你了。能干多久就干多久，打完了就卖掉。
That's why you can’t let it get cold or keep striking the same spot.
所以就别让剑身冷却下来，也别只重复锤击一个地方。
Sakra, lad! I chose you because you already know a thing or two! I'm not going to look over your shoulder all bloody day.
妈的，你这小子！要不是你还懂点皮毛，我才不会雇你！我怎么可能一天到晚都盯着你看。
Sometimes I whistle to myself to keep the rhythm going.
有时我会吹口哨来保持节奏。
Alright, you can forge me another hunting sword. Have you got what you need?
行，那你再给我锻造一把猎刀。材料都准备齐了吗？
Let's see what you can do, then.
Get to it! I want to see how you'll fare.
快来吧！让我瞧瞧你的实力。
Are you going to get started, then?
I might as well give you a try. But next time, keep in mind…
要不我还是给你个机会吧，下次长点记性…
And you can put your things in the chest there. Don't worry, nobody'll steal them.
你可以把行李都放到那屋子的箱子里。放心吧，没人会偷走的。
Well... I won't lie to you, that's pretty botched up.
嗯…实话告诉你，这不合格。
You're pretty good at swords, but what the locals really need is axes and horseshoes.
你打剑还挺在行的，只可惜这里的人最需要的是斧子和马蹄铁。
That's just fantastic. I should kill a fatted calf and open a keg of ale to celebrate His Grace's return!
这实在太棒了。我应该杀一头肥牛，开一桶麦芽酒，庆祝陛下的归来！
This is just a village, you know. The locals ain't after luxury, and they can't afford it neither.
毕竟你也知道，这就是个小村子，村里人不追求奢华，也搞不起那玩意儿。
You see how its's taking on the right shape? That's how you can tell it's almost finished.
你看它已经成型了吧？这样就算基本完工了。
You've got what you need, so go over to the anvil and you can get started.
准备得差不多了，去铁砧那儿，你就可以开始锻造了。
At the side of the house there are two doors and a wheelbarrow between them. You go in by the rear door, next to the woodshed.
房子旁边有两扇门，中间有一辆手推车。你从后边那道门进去，就挨着柴房。
Take some iron from the chest so you have something to work with.
从箱子里拿点铁料来，这样就可以开工了。
Save your apologies for someone who cares. You're lucky I ain't found nobody else. Let's get to it.
我不需要你的道歉。算你运气好，我还没找到别人，咱们开工吧！
And that was me going easy on you!
我这都是对你手下留情了！
Be glad I didn't shove your face in the shitter!
我没把你脸按进粪坑里，你就该偷着乐了！
Get you arse out of here!
Get out of my sight, you bastard!
Called himself? So this Angel is back in heaven now, is he?
曾经自称？这个安吉尔现在已经不在了，是这个意思吗？
I flogged it to this thief - Angel, he called himself.
我把它卖给了一个曾经自称安吉尔的小偷。
I was good at that… I remember pictures good, you know!
我很擅长这个…我对图画的记忆力很好！
The main thing is you survived in one piece, Kozliek.
最重要的是，你安然无恙地活了下来，科兹里克。
You don't recognise me? It's me, Kozliek! We met at Nebakov not long ago.
你不认识我了？是我，科兹里克！我们前不久在内巴科夫见过。
This is pointless. We should just go and look down by the pond and that's that.
这毫无意义。我们应该去池塘边看看然后就这样吧。
Those two vanished somewhere down by the pond.
那两个人从池塘边的某个地方消失了。
Olda looks even more elegant than Jan did on our wedding day… You've got fingers of gold!
我们婚礼那天的扬看起来很优雅，可今天的奥达更是无出其右……你可真是心灵手巧！
Piča, do not even talk to me about no silver. We almost die, and for what? Fuck all.
Pica（妈的），别跟我谈银子了。忘了我们差点丧命吗？真该死。
Do piče. I think we never get out alive.
Do pice（他妈的）。我以为再也没法活着出去了。
Just tell me you didn't throw those hand cannons in the water.
你可别告诉我，你把那些手铳扔到水里了。
Not much. There wasn't time. I had to get him out of the pillory. Why?
没有，没时间。我得把他从颈手枷里带出来，为什么这么问？
Oh, and the hand cannons. They are buried somewhere near the camp.
哦，还有手铳，它们埋在营地附近的某个地方。
Könnyű ezt mondani. Még egy köpés, és nem bírom tovább.
Könnyu ezt mondani. Még egy köpés, és nem bírom tovább.（说得轻巧。要是再被吐一口，我就忍不下去了。）
Nem tetszik, ahogy néznek minket.（他们看我们的眼神不对。）
Hiba volt idejönni.（就不该来这儿。）
Úgy néznek ránk, mint a gyilkosokra.
Úgy néznek ránk, mint a gyilkosokra.（他们就跟看杀人犯一样死盯着我们。）
Big one. In front there is... őr… guard.
大的那个。前面有... orszem... 警卫。
You Cumans are in the same boat as us nomads. You're not welcome anywhere.
你们库曼人和我们游牧民一样，任何地方都不欢迎你们。
Bazmeg, cimborák! Hol vagytok? （我们的人呢？！都死哪儿去了？）
Nem bírom egyedül, segítsetek! （撑不住了，快来搭把手！）
Bazmeg, itt vannak! Itt vannak! （糟了，他们在这儿，他们在这儿！）
Nos, Nevererd? Gyönyörű név. Olyan szép, mint te.
Nos, Nevererd? Gyönyöru név. Olyan szép, mint te.（啊，“从来没听过”？真是个美丽的名字。）
Úgy kell nekik. Amúgy is egy áruló csőcselék ez.
Úgy kell nekik. Amúgy is egy áruló csocselék ez.
Ennyi hűhó a semmiért. Mintha nyúznánk őket.
Ennyi huhó a semmiért. Mintha nyúznánk oket.
Együnk, és tunjünk innen!（吃完东西，咱们就撤。）
Ezt megértem. De valakinek el kell kezdenie meggyőzni őket, hogy nem mindenki egyforma.
Ezt megértem. De valakinek el kell kezdenie meggyozni oket, hogy nem mindenki egyforma.（我知道。但总要有人说服他们不是所有的库曼人都这副德行。）
Mondom nyugi!（我说了，别轻举妄动！）
Ha mi nyugodtak leszünk, akkor ők is.
Ha mi nyugodtak leszunk, akkor ok is.（只要保持低调，他们就不会对我们做什么。）
God be with you, noble Sir. I am Henry of Skalitz and I serve the Lord of Leipa.
上帝与你同在，尊敬的爵士。我是斯卡里茨的亨利，我为莱佩领主效力。
I'll clap you in the pillory until you rot!
我会把你送进颈手枷，让你在里面腐烂！
However he died, Jan still wants his brother's body back…
不管是怎么死的，扬还是想把他哥哥的尸体要回来......
Jan wants him back in the same state as you took him, Sir.
扬想让他保持原样地回去，爵士。
Very well. I'll pass that on to Jan.
很好。我会把这话转达给扬。
Very well. I'll go and tell Jan.
Jan has the right to know before the handover takes place.
扬有权在交接之前知道。
I'm here on behalf of Sir Jan of Suchotlesky.
我代表苏霍茨基的扬爵士来到这里。
Bad news, Sir. Jan of Suchotlesky is dead.
坏消息，苏霍茨基的扬爵士已经死了。
Then what am I supposed I tell Jan?
I think that's a reasonable demand. I'm sure Jan will be glad to pay more.
我认为这是合理的要求。我相信扬会乐意多付几个钱。
Very well, but what should I tell Jan?
好，但我应该跟扬说什么？
I won't do that to Jan.
Out of the question. Jan insists the handover takes place outside your camp. On neutral ground.
不可能。扬坚持要在你的营地外进行交接。在中立地点。
I've no idea. I'm just repeating what Jan said.
我不知道。我只是个帮扬传话的。
Certainly. But, please, allow me one question. Why has Jan sent an intermediary to handle such an important affair?
当然可以。但是，我要冒昧地问一个问题。为什么扬要派一个中间人来处理这么重要的事情？
You told Jan about it? Well, what a diligent messenger!
你把这件事告诉了扬？好吧，你可真尽职！
Now, listen well. You will tell Jan that I agreed with the terms and place of the handover.
现在，听好了。你要告诉扬，我同意交接的条件和地点。
So be it. You say Jan wants Peter's body back. Well, it will cost him something.
那就这样吧。你说扬想要回彼得的尸体。但我不能白送。
Fine. As you wish. I assume Jan will at least want a proper burial for his brother.
好。如你所愿。我猜想扬至少会想为他的哥哥举办一个体面的葬礼。
Jan certainly promised you something for your help. Rest assured that I can give you something much more valuable.
对于你的帮忙，扬肯定会许诺一些回报。放心，我可以给你提供更有价值的东西。
I trust that you are Jan's envoy. That is also why you are still alive.
我相信你是扬的特使。要不你早死了。
Where in the name of God did Jan dig you up? I do not intend to deal with a matter of this significance in an alehouse full of drunkards!
扬到底是从哪找来你的？我不想在满是酒鬼的酒馆里处理这么重要的事情！
Jan would have been wiser if he had sent a donkey with a message stuffed up its arse instead of you.
如果扬派来的是一只在屁股里塞了信的驴子而不是你，那就更明智了。
Jan knew beforehand how much coin I would want for the knight.
扬事先就知道我给骑士的标价。
I already sent several men to ambush Jan on the way here. But he somehow managed to escape.
我之前派了几个人在扬来的路上伏击他。但他逃脱了。
Bring Jan to me, help me get his money, and I will give you his brother's equipment.
把扬带给我，帮我拿到他的钱，我就把他哥哥的装备给你。
Do not tell Jan a thing and bring him to the handover location.
一个字都不要告诉扬，只管把他带到交接地点。
How is it looking with Jan?
Stop by again soon, I'll make it worth your while.
尽快再来吧，我不会让你白跑一趟的。
Give me your belt. We need to strangulate the leg, closer to the heart. Then I'll clean the wound and take a proper look at it.
把你的腰带给我。我们要在近心端包扎腿。然后我再清理伤口，好好检查一下。
The chamomile decoctions will help calm your mind, but you'll have to change your diet as well, so you don't just drink potions.
甘菊药剂有助于舒缓你的心情，但你还需要改变饮食习惯，光喝药可不行。
The chamomile decoction will help calm your mind. And a bag of dried chamomile surely won't go to waste either.
甘菊药剂能让你平静下来。一袋干燥的甘菊肯定也会起些作用的。
I'd like to give you some dried chamomile.
我想给你一些干燥的甘菊。
You should drink the chamomile decoction.
But you already gave me the decoction. How much chamomile do I have to stuff myself with?
但你已经让我喝过药剂了。我究竟还得吃多少甘菊才行呢？
More chamomile? Wasn't the dried stuff enough?
又是甘菊？那些干燥的甘菊还不够吗？
Besides, what good would it do you, a man?
而且，对你一个男人来说，它有什么用呢？
His first victim was apparently the maid Jarka. I'll go and question her guardian, Father Prokop.
凶手的第一个目标显然就是女仆贾卡，后续我得去跟她的监护人普罗科普神父谈谈。
She was orphaned as a child. The priest from the Church of Saint Peter and Paul, Father Prokop, raised her.
尚还年幼的时候她便成了孤儿，后来还是圣彼得保罗教堂的牧师，也就是普罗科普神父，把她拉扯大的。
That really surprised me, because Father Prokop had vouched for her good reputation, but who knows?
那可真是吓到我了，毕竟普罗科普神父曾为她的好德行作过担保，而谁又能想到呢？
Of the remaining four, the first to be killed was the maidservant Jarka. She was raised by Father Prokop from the Church of Saint Peter and Paul. He should know the most about her.
至于那四位最近被杀害的女孩，第一位就是女仆贾卡。她曾被圣彼得保罗教堂的普罗科普神父抚养长大，后者应该对她十分了解。
My father gave it to me. He was a blacksmith and a swordsmith... in Skalitz.
我父亲给我的。他是个铁匠和剑匠…他人在斯卡里茨。
Yes. But it was touch and go.
Aye. He's called Jan Zizka. Of Trotznow.
对。他叫扬·杰式卡。来自特罗兹诺。
We only got away by a hair's breadth. And we lost everything, including the message.
我们只是侥幸逃过一劫。但我们失去了一切，包括那封信。
And be careful! There's bound to be spies swarming around the palace. This city isn't safe.
小心点！宫殿周围肯定有眼线。这座城市并不安全。
杰式卡，特罗兹诺的扬·杰式卡？
Hahaha! Then I expect he and I will see eye to eye. Although I prefer a different strategy to braining all and sundry with a mace.
哈哈哈！那我希望我和他的看法一致。虽然我更喜欢不同的策略，而不是用钉头锤敲碎所有人的脑袋。
Did you hear about that Jan the Curious of Kunstadt?
你听过来自库斯塔特的扬吗？据说是什么事都喜欢掺一脚的人。
That bastard in the pillory has it coming, then.
那颈手枷上的杂碎就是罪有应得。
Le Chevaliér Jan? Well, he is not doing badly for a minor nobleman. But I think he will never be accepted among the higher nobles and knights.
Le Chevaliér Jan（扬骑士）？嗯，对一个次等贵族来说，他的状况还不错。但我认为他永远不会被高阶贵族和骑士所接纳。
Ah, gadjo, love to, but kada bayinav, I promised my old woman that I would not touch the dice till the end of the chhon! And Maria never gives an inch.
啊，Gadjo（外来人），我很想玩，但我答应过我老婆，永不碰骰子！玛丽亚在这件事上绝不会让步。
And you know what, gadjo? I will make it up to you however I can. Palyikerav, gadjo.
而且你知道吗，gadjo（外来人）？我会尽我所能地回报你。Palikerav, gadjo（我会的，外来人）。
Chacho, chacho, and for you, gadjo, I'll let it go for next to nothing! A token of gratitude, to let you know that us Roma never forget. Av arde, dik!
不过, 既然是你，Gadjo（外来人），为表示感谢，我们就差给你免费了！我来告诉你，我们罗姆人永不忘记！
My brothers and I nearly died at the border. When was it? Három nappal ezelőtt!
我和我的兄弟差点就死在国界附近了。是什么时候来着？对，Három nappal ezelott!（三天前）！
What ahm talking aboot is they bombards an' hand cannons that those Prague ne'er-do-wells an' rich folk are buying.
具体来说，就是指那群布拉格饭桶花大价钱买的大炮和手铳。
Koda chacho, maybe not, but that does not mean I have never heard of you, gadjo!
Koda chacho（很好），也许没有见过，但这并不意味着我没有听说过你，Gadjo（外来人）！
Lachho dives, gadjo! What would your name be? Folks call me Karol. Have we met before?
Lachho dives, gadjo（美好的一天，外来人）！ 你叫什么？大家都叫我卡洛尔。我们以前见过吗？
That depends what you fancy, gadjo!
那要看你喜欢什么，gadjo（外来人）！
The mining in Skalitz's gone to hell and the yackers with it. And the props burnt out an all.
斯卡里茨的采矿业已经完蛋了，挖客们也都跟着完蛋了。矿井巷道也都烧毁了。
So you hail from Skalitz, friend? Good to hear, I once did some work up that way. For the Sasau monastery it was. Long time ago now, though.
那么你来自斯卡里茨，朋友？很高兴听到这个消息，我曾经在在那的莎邵寺院当过差。不过已经是很久以前的事了。
What I heard was that some gadjo brutes wrongly imprisoned Tibor. Nearly chopped off his hands, head and no doubt his balls too.
我听说有些gadjo（外来人）暴徒冤枉并监禁了提波。差点砍掉他的手和头，当然还有蛋蛋。
They call me Henry of Skalitz, and no, there's little chance we met before.
他们叫我斯卡里茨的亨利，不，我们以前不可能见过。
No worries on that score. Your secret's safe with me. In Skalitz there's silver beneath every stone, so I know what's what.
这点不用担心。我会保守秘密。在斯卡里茨，每块石头下面都能找到银子，因此，我心里有数。
How is a hand cannon made?
Your hand cannons have done us more harm than good.
你的手铳对我们造成的伤害远胜过它带来的益处。
Henry of Skalitz, I'm in the service of the Lord of Leipa.
我是斯卡里茨的亨利，为莱佩领主效力。
I know the place, I'm actually from Skalitz.
我知道那个地方，我其实是斯卡里茨人。
But we shot that mare beautifully. The Devil himself couldn't have aimed any better. And he's skilled with hand cannons.
但我们射中了那匹马儿，“酒鬼”的射击真是精准，手铳也用得炉火纯青。
I'll tell you on the way. Let's have a quick drink first, eh? Want some? I still have a swig of schnapps left.
我在路上会告诉你的。先来一杯吧，嗯？你要吗？我还剩一大口烈酒。
Of course this happens to me.
And have you forgotten your hose? I can't let you into the chamber without them.
你是不是忘了穿裤子？不穿裤子，我不能让你进入会议厅。
When you were little, I knew you were destined for the pillory!
当你还小的时候，我就知道你将来注定要被拷上颈手枷！
You know, Menhard, Henry of Skalitz is no easy mark.
你知道的，门哈德，斯卡里茨的亨利不容易对付。
Follow us to the Kaiser Karl tavern here in Kuttenberg. It is not far from here. We can talk in peace there.
跟我们去库滕堡的查理皇帝酒馆吧，离这儿不远。我们可以在那里安静地谈话。
The Emperor Karl der Große himself founded it. There is no more lovely Stadt under the sun.
Emperor Karl der Große（查理皇帝）亲自建造了它。天下没有比它更美丽的Stadt（城市）了。
We will discuss everything at Kaiser Karl Tavern.
我们可以在Kaiser Karl Tavern（查理皇帝酒馆）畅谈。
Ich schneide dich auf! （我要割了你的喉！）
Ich stech dich ab, du Schwein!
Ich stech dich ab, du Schwein! （尝尝我的刀锋吧，臭猪！）
Sprich ein Gebet! （念你的遗言吧！）
Yes, yes, but you will see yourself it is not worth it.
Yes, yes, but you will see yourself it is not worth it.
But first you need to listen to how it works around here.
But first you need to listen to how it works around here.
And now do not bother me.
And now do not bother me.
Even Bibrek, the best Cuman rider, is afraid of me.
Even Bibrek, the best Cuman rider, is afraid of me.
Just so you see how it goes and get a feel for how to handle the horse.
Just so you see how it goes and get a feel for how to handle the horse.
They are almost as clever as people. If Tooth happened to outlive me, he could easily organise these races on his own.
They are almost as clever as people. If Tooth happened to outlive me, he could easily organise these races on his own.
We will race, we will race, but…
We will race, we will race, but…
I would like to, but there is no one to race with.
I would like to, but there is no one to race with.
Every challenger must first bow to Zamur. I tell you, he was ahell of a rider! People will talk about him until Judgement Day.
Every challenger must first bow to Zamur. I tell you, he was ahell of a rider! People will talk about him until Judgement Day.
This one has managed to finish as well!
This one has managed to finish as well!
If you forget anything, drop by and we will go over it.
If you forget anything, drop by and we will go over it.
Quickly! What are you standing there for?
Quickly! What are you standing there for?
You and Bibrek are the same then. Riding is fine, sure, but otherwise you do not care about the animal.
You and Bibrek are the same then. Riding is fine, sure, but otherwise you do not care about the animal.
Well done. Our agreement stands, I accept you as a proven horseman.
Well done. Our agreement stands, I accept you as a proven horseman.
Ignore Bibrek. We Lovari are more than happy to outsmart the likes of him in horse trading.
Ignore Bibrek. We Lovari are more than happy to outsmart the likes of him in horse trading.
He is a Cuman who claims he is not Cuman. But he can shoot, I do admit that.
He is a Cuman who claims he is not Cuman. But he can shoot, I do admit that.
At least you can think about what you have done.
At least you can think about what you have done.
Surely you would not wear the same pair for marching as you would to a dance, would you?
你出远门和跳舞的时候，穿的鞋肯定不一样，对吧？
But never mind him. We Lovari are more than happy to outsmart the likes of him in trade.
But never mind him. We Lovari are more than happy to outsmart the likes of him in trade.
Trust me, I have known him longer than you have. He would take it as an insult and you or your horse would end up with an arrow in their backside.
Trust me, I have known him longer than you have. He would take it as an insult and you or your horse would end up with an arrow in their backside.
Tired of shooting straw targets already, are you? Well, so be it.
Tired of shooting straw targets already, are you? Well, so be it.
Yes. I do not know much, but about horses I know plenty.
对。别的我可能不太懂，但说到马，我可是专家。
Come on then. We will settle it at the altar, so Zamur’s spirit can hear it straight away.
Come on then. We will settle it at the altar, so Zamur’s spirit can hear it straight away.
No worries. We will ride again tomorrow.
No worries. We will ride again tomorrow.
So you do not whine later that you had no idea what is what.
So you do not whine later that you had no idea what is what.
After what you have tried on here? Not a chance!
After what you have tried on here? Not a chance!
Ask our horses about that. They will tell you how a proper Lovari cares for them.
Ask our horses about that. They will tell you how a proper Lovari cares for them.
But we are missing a proper challenger. It is as if we cannot find a single decent rider anywhere around here...
But we are missing a proper challenger. It is as if we cannot find a single decent rider anywhere around here...
It certainly is not. If you thought you could wriggle out of the racing, forget it.
It certainly is not. If you thought you could wriggle out of the racing, forget it.
And where is your horse? Did Bibrek stuff it with straw?
And where is your horse? Did Bibrek stuff it with straw?
I am Mikolai and with my horse Tooth I organise horse races in this region.
I am Mikolai and with my horse Tooth I organise horse races in this region.
That is how it should be. But not everyone understands that. And Bibrek least of all.
That is how it should be. But not everyone understands that. And Bibrek least of all.
You really let me down, just so you know. And not just me. No races for the next few days.
You really let me down, just so you know. And not just me. No races for the next few days.
To the altar of the great rider Zamur. Only when you bow to him may you begin racing.
To the altar of the great rider Zamur. Only when you bow to him may you begin racing.
What does it mean that you're "Lovari"?
What does it mean that you're "Lovari"?
And do people bring their horses to you for shoeing?
会有人把马牵来找你钉蹄铁吗？
Bibrek told me you’re in charge of things here?
Bibrek told me you’re in charge of things here?
I've completed the challenges for both you and Bibrek, and you both said you'd abide by my word.
I've completed the challenges for both you and Bibrek, and you both said you'd abide by my word.
You give horses diabolical horseshoes that allow them to jump around cliffs and who knows what else.
听说你会给马钉上有魔法的马蹄铁，让它们能跃上悬崖，说不定还搞了些别的什么名堂。
Alright... but how about these races? How do they go?
Alright... but how about these races? How do they go?
I’m looking for someone who organises horse races here.
I’m looking for someone who organises horse races here.
Good thing you spoke up. I'm looking for someone like that right now.
Good thing you spoke up. I'm looking for someone like that right now.
You said we must go to some altar before the race?
You said we must go to some altar before the race?
He's simply a partner. A friend and a helper. Rather like a dog.
He's simply a partner. A friend and a helper. Rather like a dog.
Well, it's just a horse. Good for travelling but otherwise it only eats, shits and isn't very bright.
Well, it's just a horse. Good for travelling but otherwise it only eats, shits and isn't very bright.
It seems I've completed your tasks.
It seems I've completed your tasks.
You are in the right place.
You are in the right place.
So be it. I'll go and see Bibrek.
So be it. I'll go and see Bibrek.
I'd rather speak with Bibrek first. You said he organises archery contests?
I'd rather speak with Bibrek first. You said he organises archery contests?
I mean... It does not matter. I am done.
I mean... It does not matter. I am done.
But that's probably not enough to settle your quarrel, is it?
But that's probably not enough to settle your quarrel, is it?
Bibrek told me only nice things about you as well.
Bibrek told me only nice things about you as well.
I'd wait a bit with that.
I'd wait a bit with that.
Isn't it enough that I finished your challenge? Maybe we can convince him now.
Isn't it enough that I finished your challenge? Maybe we can convince him now.
Wait… Let me think about it.
Wait… Let me think about it.
You know what? Let’s hold off for now.
You know what? Let’s hold off for now.
Another one at the finish. We have been waiting for you!
Another one at the finish. We have been waiting for you!
That was a really nice technique in that fight with Arne! Can you teach me that?
在跟阿耳涅的战斗里，你使用的技艺很高超！你能教我吗？
Making the chamomile decoction is important. It's made of wine, chamomile and sage. You boil them briefly together and strain it.
必须熬些甘菊药剂来。它含有葡萄酒、甘菊和鼠尾草。你可以直接将它们放在一起煮沸，然后再过滤出汤液。
Besides praying, you can brew up some of the chamomile decoction.
除了祈祷，你还可以熬煮一些甘菊药剂。
Besides praying, don't forget about the chamomile decoctions.
除了祈祷，别忘了给他喝甘菊药剂。
Someone in Zhelejov suggested I should take a look round the nomad camp.
哲勒约夫有人建议我去游牧民营地看看。
Her name's Enneleyn of Wintherthur. She was in the nomad camp.
温特图尔的恩内琳。她在游牧民营地。
Aye, I can read. But I reckon that's the catch, isn't it…?
是的，我识字。不过我觉得事情没这么简单，是吗？
I had a peek inside. The pictures are nice, but what do you want to learn from them?
我已经偷偷看过了。图画很漂亮，但你想从中学到什么呢？
The bath wenches don't want anything to do with the chamberlain. Bad experiences, they say.
澡堂女仆们不想和管家扯上任何关系，她们说有不好的经历。
I talked to Dorothy about the chamberlain.
我跟多萝西说了管家的事。
I talked to the Zhelejov bathhouse wenches about the chamberlain.
我跟哲勒约夫的澡堂女仆谈了谈管家的事。
They said I'd find someone called Enneleyn of Wintherthur who could play our mistress for the chamberlain.
他们说我能找到温特图尔的恩内琳。她可以给管家作情妇。
The thing with the girl for the chamberlain didn't work out, but I reckon you knew that already.
那个姑娘和管家的事搞砸了，但我猜你应该已经知道了。
And when the chamberlain becomes insistent, you, as her personal bodyguard, will accept his offer.
当管家坚持时，你作为她的贴身护卫，将接受他的提议。
The catch is the chest in under lock and key, and most likely well-guarded.
对，问题就是那个箱子上锁了，并且很可能把守严密。
Just get some inconspicuous clothing and head over there after midnight.
穿上不显眼的衣服，午夜之后进去就可以了。
The castle's weak spot is Chamberlain Ulrich, because he himself has a weakness… For women.
城堡的弱点是管家乌尔里希，因为他也有自己的弱点……就是女人。
In the good hands of a messenger who'll hand it over to Hermes Trismegistos.
在一个可靠的信使手里，他会交到库滕堡的赫耳墨斯·特里斯墨吉斯忒斯的手里。
Ah, Jurko, you're talking about our liquor?
啊，朱尔科，你之前想说的是我们的烈酒？
I don't know him very well. They call him Jan.
大家都叫他扬，但我不太了解他。
They call him Jan! But that's all I know, for fuck's sake!
他们叫他扬！他妈的，我只知道这么多了！
Lullaby potion is for sleep! But not eternal sleep! You would have to drink a whole barrel for it to kill you.
安眠毒药会让人昏睡！但不是永远沉睡！你得喝下一整桶这种药剂才会致命！
有人吗？！有没有人？！来人啊！
I'll give him what for, don't you worry!
Just show me who to thrash!
倒要看看是谁活得不耐烦了！
Right, just show me who's arse needs kicking!
好，告诉我是谁那么欠揍！
Why didn't Ambrose avenge his brother Jan's death? He must have realised that you two were involved in it…
为什么安布洛斯不为他弟弟约翰报仇？他一定意识到你们两个与此有关…
All right. We'll give him a proper burial. Jan's soul has the right to eternal rest.
好。我们会体面地埋葬他。约翰的灵魂有权得到永恒的安息。
You were right. Poor Jan deserves a proper grave.
你说得对。可怜的约翰应该有一个像样的坟墓。
The conciliatory cross where they saw the apparition... That's to commemorate Jan?
周边有幽灵出没的和解十字架…是为了纪念约翰？
Only on the condition that Jan's bones will be laid to rest in consecrated ground!
只是条件是，将约翰的遗骨安葬在圣土里！
Would you rather have it on your conscience that Jan's soul will burn in hell? That neither Vashek nor I will find peace?
难道你宁愿让约翰的灵魂在地狱里燃烧，让自己良心不安？让瓦谢克和我无法得到安宁？
When they found his body at the bottom of the cliff, people thought he'd killed himself. The only one who didn't believe it was Jan's brother.
当人们在悬崖底部发现他的尸体时，都以为他是自杀。只有约翰的哥哥不相信。
The memories are painful… We were childhood friends and Jan loved me. Only… I chose his friend Vashek over him…
记忆是痛苦的…我们是青梅竹马，约翰很爱我。只是…我选择了他的朋友瓦谢克…
It was an accident! They quarrelled… Jan drew his sword first and Vashek had to defend himself.
那是个意外！他们吵了起来…约翰先拔出了剑，瓦谢克不得不进行自卫。
The worst thing about it is that Jan didn't kill himself. He didn't deserve such a dishonourable burial!
最糟糕的是，约翰并非自杀。他不该被这样潦草埋葬！
That's the only way we can put right a terrible mistake! Jan didn't kill himself.
只有这样，我们才能纠正一个可怕的错误！约翰不是自杀的。
Apparently, they got close to the cliff edge while they were fighting… and Jan fell.
很显然，他们打斗着到了悬崖边…约翰掉下去了。
It pained him till the day he died. And he lived in fear of Jan's brother creeping up behind him one day and taking his revenge…
这件事至死都折磨着他。他一直生活在恐惧之中，害怕约翰的哥哥有一天会悄悄地来到他身后，为弟弟报仇…
Du hast ein Mal, Mann!（你身上有烙印！）
Du hast ein Mal, Mann!（你身上有烙印！）
Za te sliczna cycatke z lazni!
Tell him to bring an army and put an end to their mischief!
让他带兵过来，将他们全部剿灭！
At least get your horses ready, then, so you can leave at once.
那至少要准备好你们的马，这样你们就能立即出发了。
But I have to admit, Captain Zizka, that you've been a much bigger thorn in our backsides than we care for.
但我不得不承认，杰式卡队长，你一直是我们的心腹之患，远远超出了我们所能容忍的程度。
Who are they? And where the fuck did they come from?
他们是什么人？！从他妈的哪里冒出来的？
Achtung! Ich kann nicht schießen! （小心！我没法放箭！）
Fuck... I can't get a shot in!
Watch out! I can't get a shot in.
Verdammt, ich kann nichts sehen! （我什么都不清，靠！）
What are you talking about, Frantishek?
你在说什么，弗朗特齐歇克？
Ha, zeig, was du draufhast! （哈，让我看看你几斤几两！）
Not tough enough on your own?!
Ganging up on one man? Cowards!
一群人打一个人？胆小鬼！
你给我纳命来，你个混蛋！
Dir wird in den Arsch getreten!
Dir wird in den Arsch getreten! （等着被打爆吧！）
Ich schlage dir die Fresse ein!
Ich schlage dir die Fresse ein!（看我把你头都打掉！）
You're outnumbered, you shit! You haven't a chance!
你寡不敌众，狗屎！你没有一丝胜算！
Get ready to leave this life!
Show what you're made of, you wretch!
拿出你的真本事来，废物！
让你见识见识我的厉害！
It'll be over in a jiffy!
我是亨利。Von Skalitz（来自斯卡里茨）。
Csapd le a dögöt! （滚开，杂种！）
Off to the sawbones before you die!
Das ist nutzlos, Scheißer … （这可不是闹着玩的，蠢货！）
Ha ha, du Mistkerl! （哈哈，蠢货！）
Ha ha, du Scheißkerl! （哈哈！废物！）
He, Arschloch! Na los! （嘿，贱货，你过来啊！）
Ja, das stimmt! （很好，这就对了！）
One more blow and he'd be a corpse!
再给他一击，他就死定了！
Your Ma won't save you now!
Verdammt! Ich hatte dich fast.（妈的，差点就干掉你了！）
Fleeing, you fuck?! I haven't finished with you yet!
想逃，你这混蛋？！我们还没完呢！
Aaah, du Arschloch! （啊，这凶残的禽兽！）
Aaah, du Ungeheuer! （啊，该死的畜生！）
Ich zerhack dich! （看我把您剁成碎片！）
Oh ... kratz ab, Köter! （去死啊，杂种！）
Scheiße! Das Biest hat mich gebissen!
Scheiße! Das Biest hat mich gebissen! （妈的！那条狗咬我！）
Achtung! Beißendes Biest! （小心！这狗很凶猛！）
Hey, what kind of wine is this? It's got a kick like a mule! like a moonshine.
嘿，这是什么酒？太带劲了！像是私酒啊。
Stop faffing about and get to work.
别瞎折腾了，快干活去吧。
Then go over to the anvil and let's get started.
到铁砧那边去，然后就开工吧。
Have you taken what you need from the chest yet?
你从箱子里拿到材料了吧？
Stop faffing about and get the things from the chest.
别瞎折腾了，把箱子里的材料拿出来吧。
Blah, blah, blah. What a load of shit.
What's it to you? I can do whatever I want!
这关你什么事？我想干嘛就干嘛！
What do you want? Keep watch and leave me alone.
你想干什么？值你的守，别来烦我。
I'm not doing anything. You're doing a great job keeping watch.
我可没干啥。你站岗可真是认真啊。
Maybe? That's not against the law, is it?
是喝了一点……这不犯法吧？
I'm not doing anything, am I? So shut your mouth.
我又没做什么，是吧？闭上你的嘴。
Aye, I've had a little tipple.
Why don't you worry about who's robbing who and leave me alone?
你怎么不操心谁又把谁给抢了，别来烦我！
I want your weapon and all your money!
Give me everything you have and I'll let you go.
把你身上所有东西都给我，我就放你走。
放下你的武器，然后快滚。
You're not going anywhere until I say so!
I'm not going to just let you leave.
We'll see if I let you go or not.
想跑？先问问我同不同意！
Get on your feet and fight!
Why should I let you go?
Get lost and don't come back!
赶紧滚，别让我再看见你！
Get out of here before I change my mind!
There'll be no mercy for you, you bastard!
我不会对你手下留情的，你个混蛋！
If you want to leave, you'd better pay up!
Back on your feet! Now! We aren't done yet!
快给我起来！还没打完呢！
Azt hittem van ott valami. De nem láttam semmit. Meg kell dupláznunt az őrséget.
Azt hittem van ott valami. De nem láttam semmit. Meg kell dupláznunt az orséget.
Ah nein, du Schwein! （不，你这混蛋！）
Wh… What? You piece of shit!
Enough, you bastard! Now I'll chop your arse up!
够了，杂种！老子这就把你剁成碎片！
Enough! Give up or you'll be sorry, you bastard!
够了！认输吧，不然你可吃不了兜着走，杂种！
Ah, afraid to get your arse kicked, are you?!
啊，怕被我痛扁一顿，是吗？
Let's see what you're made of, you bastard!
来看看你到底有几斤几两，你个杂碎！
You want to make this interesting, eh? Have it your way!
你想把事情闹大，嗯？那奉陪到底！
What are you doing? A weapon?! You fucker!
你在搞什么鬼？还拿武器？！你这个孬种！
Doprdele… You leave me no other choice!
For fuck's sake, put that thing away or you're dead!
该死的，把那东西收起来，要不你就死定了！
Eh, Christ… You're not squirming out of this one, arsehole!
呃，天啊…你这次插翅难逃，混蛋！
Alright, we'll do this the hard way!
好吧，那我们就硬碰硬吧！
Alright then, have it your way, you bastard!
好吧，那随你的便，你个杂碎！
Kurva... fuck this. Die, you piece of shit!
该死…他妈的。去死吧，狗东西！
Kurva… Just you wait. I'll show you!
Kurva… （该死…）等着吧。老子这就给你好看！
Last chance to surrender, you piece of shit!
最后一次投降的机会，你个废物！
You'll never beat me, you swine!
I thought we were fighting fair, arsehole!
说好公平对决的呢，混蛋！
Put down the weapon and surrender, arsehole!
Do you really want to die here, you bastard?!
你真想死在这里吗，狗东西？！
Sakra! You want to fight it out with blades, do you?
Sakra! （妈的！）你想用刀子一决死战，是吗？
You're only making it worse for yourself with that weapon, arsehole!
拿着武器只会让你死得更难看，蠢货！
Bringing a weapon to a fistfight, eh, you prick? I'll show you!
你这混蛋，拳斗还带武器？你等着瞧！
You're only making it worse for yourself, give up!
你这是在自讨苦吃，赶紧认输！
So your fists aren't good enough, eh?
看来你的拳头不够硬啊，是吗？
Enough! Surrender or I'll kill you!
You might as well give up, fucker!
Give up or this will end badly for you!
认输吧，不然你会死得很惨！
Kurva… I'll get you for that!
Bloody whoreson! You're not leaving here alive!
天杀的贱货！你别想活着离开这！
Ez a bor romlott. Úgy tűnik ki kell öntenünk.
Ez a bor romlott. Úgy tunik ki kell öntenünk.
Senki se egyen ebből a kajából, amíg teljesen meg nem főztük.
Senki se egyen ebbol a kajából, amíg teljesen meg nem foztuk.
I hope we never meet again.
Du hast bekommen, was du wolltest.
Du hast bekommen, was du wolltest.（你想要的都到手了）
That's all I have, now let me go.
我只有这些了，快放我走吧。
Gott, lieber Gott. （天，亲爱的上帝啊。）
No! I won't let you disarm me!
不行！别想夺走我的武器！
Ich ergebe mich! Ich ergebe …（我投降！我投降……）
拿着！我所有东西都在这了！
Aha! So that's the way it'll be!
啊哈！我知道你想干什么！
Alright, easy now. Just let me go and I'll give you everything!
好，别冲动。只要放我走，我什么都给你！
I'd rather die with my weapon!
Here you go! Now keep your word!
I surrender! You wouldn't kill me, would you?
我投降！你会绕我一命的，对吗？
你也不是什么硬骨头嘛！
You promised to free me, now keep your word!
你答应过要放我走的，可别骗我！
Alright, I'm leaving… I hope you keep your promise!
那我走了…你可不要食言啊！
Phew, I thought I was dead for sure.
I'm leaving, you'd better keep your word!
我要走了，你最好说到做到！
Shit! I've got to get away!
You got what you wanted, now let me go!
这下你满意了吧，快放我走吧！
Kurva… I've gotta get out of here!
That's enough, isn't it? Now let me go!
这些够了吧？快放我走吧！
Thank you, lad. You won't see me again!
谢谢你，伙计。你不会再见到我了！
I'm going, I'm going! Take it easy!
Fuck, I'm not up to this!
Nein, scheiß drauf. （去他的，我不管了！）
Alright. I hope I don't run into you again.
好。希望我不会再碰到你。
Oy vey, ikh fayfe daroyf. （啊，去你的…)
Scheiße, nichts wie weg! (可恶，我得撤了！）
Alright, I'm going… take it easy!
Ah, lieber Gott! So viel ... Blut!
Ah, lieber Gott! So viel ... Blut!（我的天啊！杀人了！血流成河啊！）
Oh nein, lieber Gott!（哦不，天哪！）
Ah, nein! Hilfe, Hilfe!（不！救命，救命啊！）
Come on now! Put that away!
You want to hurt someone? Put it away!
你不怕伤着别人吗？把武器收起来！
Do you want to hurt someone? Put that away!
你不怕伤着别人吗？把武器收起来！
Are you trying to hurt someone?!
You want to hurt someone? Don't be a fool!
你不怕伤着别人吗？别胡闹！
What are you doing with that weapon?
What are you playing at? Do you want to shoot someone?
你在胡闹什么？射到别人怎么办？
What are you doing here with that weapon?!
What are you doing with that weapon?!
What are you doing with that?
What are you doing with that?
What are you doing here with that weapon?!
Why are you skulking around here?
你偷偷摸摸地在这儿干啥呢？
What are you poking around here for, you scoundrel?
你在到处打探什么，你个无赖？
He! Steck die Waffe weg! （嘿！把武器收起来！）
Doprdele! I'm not up to this!
Fúj de rohatt büdös. Szabaduj meg tőle gyorsan!
Fúj de rohatt budos. Szabaduj meg tole gyorsan!
Hilfe! So helft mir!（救命！来人啊！）
Ich komme, mein Freund!（来了，我的朋友！）
Ich komme dir helfen!（我来帮你了！）
Ich reiß dir deinen Arsch auf!
Ich reiß dir deinen Arsch auf!（我要打烂你的脸！）
I'll help you with that scum!
Right, so it was you who was shooting here!
好啊，原来在这射击的人是你啊！
Right, so it was you shooting here!
好啊，原来射击的人是你啊！
Las mikh! Las mikh, khazer!（滚开，贱人！）
You're in for an arse-kicking, you piece of shit!
I'll tear you a new arsehole, you fucker!
我要把你打得找不着北，混账东西！
Christ have mercy! He's gonna kill me!
He! Steck die Waffe weg! （喂！把武器收起来！）
Oy, peyresh! Ikh fayfe daroyf.（见鬼！去他妈的！）
Oy… shlegrey! Shlegrey!（不要啊……打起来了！有人打起来了！）
Oy vey... Krov! Krov!（不要啊……打起来了！有人打起来了！）
My god! They're going to kill each other!
What are you lurking around here for?
你在这里偷偷摸摸地干什么？
You want to shoot someone?! Put it away!
射到别人怎么办？！把武器收起来！
Scheiße! Jetzt reicht es …（妈的，够了……）
Scher dich zum Teufel!（下地狱吧！）
Put that away! You could hurt someone!
把武器收起来！免得伤到别人！
Put that thing away! Before you shoot someone!
把武器收起来！免得射到别人！
You want to hurt someone? Put it away!
你不怕伤着别人吗？把武器收起来！
Sprich deine Gebete, Arschloch!（准备受死吧，贱人！）
There's a murderer on the loose!
You don't need a weapon here.
Now you're going to get it!
You were the one shooting here! That's clear as day!
你就是那个射击的人！光天化日！
It was you that was shooting, I'm sure of it!
肯定是你在射击，我敢肯定！
It must've been you who was shooting!
It must've been you who was shooting!
You're the one shooting here? Shame on you!
你就是那个刚在这射击的人？真可耻！
It's you that's shooting here? Shame on you!
是你刚在这射击？真可耻！
What are you playing at? Put that away!
你在胡闹什么？把武器收起来！
Vos makhst du, khamer?（你在胡闹什么，蠢货？）
Was soll das? （这是怎么回事？）
Was machst du, du Narr?（干什么呢，蠢货！）
Was machst du Narr?（你这蠢货干什么呢？）
You want to hurt someone? Put it away!
你不怕伤着别人吗？把武器收起来！
Put that away before you hurt someone!
把武器收起来，免得伤到人！
What are you doing here with that weapon?!
Quit fooling around and put it away!
别再胡闹了，把武器收起来！
Watch out! That whoreson is with them!
小心！那混蛋和他们是一伙的！
There's more of us! Chop them up!
我们的人更多！砍死他们！
Ram your steel up their arses!
That won't help you, you whoresons!
那也救不了你们的狗命，杂碎！
What the fuck are you doing to him?!
你他妈的要对他干什么？！
Fick dich, du Wichser! （操，你个废物！）
Ha, we'll soon even things up!
There's more of us! You haven't a chance!
我们人比你多！你毫无胜算！
Jetzt bist du dran! （你完蛋了！）
I'll shove steel up your arse!
We're not afraid of you, you wretches!
我们才不怕你们这些小人！
Don't fuck with us, you wretch!
This is your end, you wretch!
Didn't expect that, eh, you scum?!
Careful that impudent behaviour doesn't come back to bite you on the arse, lad.
小子，别太嚣张，小心以后遭报应！
Well, well... Who do we have here? Greetings.
哎哟哟…看看谁来了？你好。
I'm going to kick your arse when nobody's looking...
等没人的时候，看我不收拾你的…
God be with you! Keep the peace and we'll stay friends.
上帝与你同在！别惹事，我们就还是朋友。
What are you roaming around here for?
What are you doing here? It hasn't been safe around here as of late!
你在这晃悠啥？这里最近可不太平！
Hah, well don't tell anybody, but so did I before my shift!
哈，好吧，不要告诉别人，我值守前也喝了点！
Hah, had a few swigs this early in the day, eh?
Hey, you! Have you done something I should know about?
喂，你！是不是做了什么坏事？
Hmm, I'm not going to forget such insolence.
嗯，我记住你了，无礼的小子。
Not at the moment you didn't, but I know who you are!
目前的确没有，可我知道你是什么货色！
Drunk, eh? Don't be getting into any trouble, then!
喝醉了？最好别给我惹麻烦！
Of course not. Swig away, friend.
Not too bad. It'd be better if it wasn't raining, though!
Don't you dare cause any trouble!
Has the night watchman rung already? Well, don't be out late.
守夜人已经敲钟了吗？好吧，别在外头待太晚。
Keep the peace, and we won't have any problems.
别惹事，那样我们就相安无事。
What a shitty evening this turned out to be…
Crime's been on the bloody rise as of late!
最近犯罪的越来越多了！
Can you tell me about the nomads?
你可以再说说那些游牧民的事吗？
I can talk to God when I want to. I do not need the Pope's blessing for that! We have no kings, judges or executioners!
只要我想，我自己就可以跟上帝对话，不需要教皇来替我传达！在我们这里，没有所谓的君王！没有世俗的评判！更没有冷血的刽子手！
Cumans? I don't know where they might be, but I hear they made friends with the Rocktower nomads.
库曼人？我不知道他们可能在哪里，但我听说他们和那些石塔游牧民有些交情。
The Cumans? Better not get tangled up with them… All I know is they're on good terms with those nomads.
库曼人？最好不要和他们扯上关系…我只知道他们与那些游牧民关系不错。
The Cumans? Why do you even care about them? I don't know where they are, but they were on good terms with those damned nomads!
库曼人？你为什么要打听他们的情况？我不知道他们在哪里，只知道他们和那些该死的游牧民有些交情！
But I wasn't very good at it, so I ended up … in the pillory.
但我并不太擅长此道，所以我就…被关颈手枷上了。
Rat and I are the... main workforce around here.
我和老鼠是…这里的主力。
Godwin, move downstairs! We can handle it here!
古德温！快下去！这里我们顶得住！
Don't let them climb up! Knock it down!
别让他们爬上来！把梯子推倒！
Just before I tell you more about it, try talking to Rat.
在我告诉你更多信息之前，先和老鼠谈谈吧。
Well… a result fit for a Cuman. It did not go well.
Well… a result fit for a Cuman. It did not go well.
Not enough points, this will not do.
Not enough points, this will not do.
Shoe your horse with them and you can't lose.
你给马钉上，保证不会输。
I'll bear that in mind. Thanks.
I'll bear that in mind. Thanks.
I have those horseshoes for you.
我给你把马蹄铁带来了。
Some other time, I need to catch my breath.
Some other time, I need to catch my breath.
They're my own work, but made exactly according to the ones I found in the nomads' camp.
是我自己做的，但我保证，它们和我在游民营地里找到的马蹄铁一模一样。
If this were a competition in missing the targets, you would have won.
If this were a competition in missing the targets, you would have won.
Exactly as you wanted. Things were a a bit different with the horseshoe, but that’s a long story.
都是按你的要求做的。马蹄铁的事出了点岔子，但要说清楚得费点时间。
So, what do you think? Do you like the sword?
那你觉得这把剑怎么样？满意吗？
Excellent, my friend! Now we'll plant it on that damsel to Florian's right. The young one who never stops blabbering on.
好极了，朋友！现在我们把它交给弗洛里安右边的那位年轻女士，就是一直说个不停的那个。
And once word gets out, the people will come pouring in to see the saddler.
等消息一传开，人们肯定会一窝蜂地跑到鞍匠这里来。
And do you know what? Come back in a few days. The race will be over by then. And if I win, I'll split the winnings with you.
这样吧，过几天，你再来一趟，等我比完赛。要是我赢了，奖金咱俩分。
You have the magic horseshoes? Show me!
你拿到有魔力的马蹄铁了？给我看看！
Stop wasting my time! Come back when you actually have something.
别耽误我时间！等你真拿到了再来找我。
Why wouldn't I? If these horseshoes are really magic, I'll win any race with them.
当然是真的。如果这套马蹄铁真有魔力，什么比赛我都能赢。
Well damn, thank you! And here you are. For your good work.
哇，谢谢！这是给你的报酬，辛苦了。
So don't forget, I'll mind those groschen for you in the meantime.
所以到时候我先帮你保管那些格罗申，你可别忘了来取啊。
Is it really them? I've never seen horsehoes like these. And those strange spikes they have…
真的就是这种？我从没见过这样的马蹄铁。上面还有些奇怪的刺……
What the hell is this? Where are the horseshoes I wanted?
这是什么意思？我要的马蹄铁呢？
你的道歉对我来说毫无价值！
You have enough skill now to try other courses and difficulty levels too.
You have enough skill now to try other courses and difficulty levels too.
Do not let it happen again, do you understand?
Do not let it happen again, do you understand?
The third course is conquered, and if Karachin were alive, he would deem you his equal.
The third course is conquered, and if Karachin were alive, he would deem you his equal.
And make sure you place a wager next time. Drop by.
And make sure you place a wager next time. Drop by.
If I counted correctly, you have now finished the second test.
If I counted correctly, you have now finished the second test.
Damn it. Someone has stolen my groschen.
Damn it. Someone has stolen my groschen.
You have conquered the first course! I knew you would manage it.
You have conquered the first course! I knew you would manage it.
You outscored me on points. How do you do it?
You outscored me on points. How do you do it?
You are banned until I change my mind.
You are banned until I change my mind.
What was that supposed to mean?! I will not tolerate that kind of behaviour in a race!
What was that supposed to mean?! I will not tolerate that kind of behaviour in a race!
Do not think I have forgotten what you did last time.
Do not think I have forgotten what you did last time.
You have not beaten my score, but at least you matched it. That counts too.
You have not beaten my score, but at least you matched it. That counts too.
You have the same as I do, which means a victory for you and a defeat for me.
You have the same as I do, which means a victory for you and a defeat for me.
You scored the same as I did.
You scored the same as I did.
When you ride again, I shall keep a closer eye on the chest.
When you ride again, I shall keep a closer eye on the chest.
Where's Hare? I left him to wait at the Devil's Den so he'd lead you here!
黑尔在哪里？我让他在魔窟酒馆等着，好把你带到这里！
放你的屁！你的死期到了！
Leck mich am Arsch!（吃屎去吧！）
Stick that up your arse! Now I'm going to kill you!
闭上鸟嘴去死吧！我要杀了你！
You had your chance! Now fight!
给过你机会了！给我继续打！
You should have thought about that earlier! Now you can stick it up your arse!
你早点怎么不投降！乖乖受死吧！
And here's the sausage in return, like we agreed.
这是换给你的香肠，咱之前说好的。
那些羊的事情总算搞完了。
Trutht me, I'll make it worth your while. What do you thay?
相信我，我不会让你白跑一趟的。你看怎么样？
Saxony, Bavaria and so on. The German states, basically.
在萨克森、巴伐利亚等地，都属于德意志地区。
But that's a type of grape. I mean the type of wine. I surely don't have to tell you the grape variety is only half the taste.
但那是一种葡萄。我是指葡萄酒的类型。你肯定知道，葡萄品种只能决定一半的味道。
Thank you, Sir, for not sending us straight to the pillory.
大人，谢谢您没有直接把我们送进颈手枷。
Cedo nulli! Aut vincere aut mori!
Cedo nulli! Aut vincere aut mori! （永不退缩，至死方休！）
Forgive me Lord for what I do!
主啊，原谅我的所作所为吧！
Forgive me Lord for what I do!
主啊，原谅我的所作所为吧！
I might be old, but I'm not written off!
我年纪虽大，但也不是吃素的！
I'll shoot you right up your arse!
I'll shoot you right up your arse!
Smile, you fuck! While you've still got teeth!
趁你还有牙，赶紧笑吧，废物！
Bár a csehek sem megvetendoek.（但捷克的姑娘也不赖啦。）
Fentről kellett volna hívnod egy nőt, hogy segítsen.
Fentrol kellett volna hívnod egy not, hogy segítsen.（你应该去找个女人，她能帮你。）
Ne beszélj állandóan az ételről, most iszunk.
Ne beszélj állandóan az ételrol, most iszunk.（别扯食物的事了，现在只管喝酒。）
Elég volt ebből a beszédből. Inkább igyál.
Elég volt ebbol a beszédbol. Inkább igyál.（别再说了，继续喝吧。）
Leck mich am Arsch! （去吃屎吧！）
You want to yield all of a sudden?!
晚了，我已经给过你面子了！
You should have thought of that sooner!
... Aber mach keinen Unsinn! （很好，没问题！）
Gut, aber mach keinen Ärger! （很好，但别想耍花样！）
… But no messing around, you hear me?!
Achtung! Er schießt! （小心！我们被瞄准了！）
Alles klar, Arschloch! （好啊，你个混蛋！）
Das hilft dir nicht weiter! （那玩意儿也救不了你！）
Keep that mace away from me!
让那把钉头锤离我远点！
Lass es fallen und bettle um Gnade!
Lass es fallen und bettle um Gnade! （快点缴械投降！）
Oh, ein Schwert, wie? （哦，使剑的？）
Nice mace! I'll take that when I'm done with you!
钉头锤真不错！等我把你弄死就是我的了！
Schieb's dir in den Arsch! （插回你屁眼里去吧！）
You can shove that up your arse!
那你把剑插回屁眼去吧！
That mace won't do you any good!
你拿着那把钉头锤也没用！
An axe? A fat lot of good that'll do you!
Drop the axe and beg for mercy!
Auf Wiedersehen, du Arschloch. （永别了，杂碎）
Du bist erledigt, Mann! (你小子完蛋了！）
Das war’s, du Bastard! （结束了，你这杂碎！）
Fertig! Wer ist der Nächste?! （解决了！下一个是谁！）
Ha ha, fahr zur Hölle! （哈哈，去你的吧！）
Ha, that bastard just won't die!
He, das ist der letzte! （嘿，这是最后一个了！）
He, Arschloch! Na los! （嘿，贱货，你过来啊！）
You're going to lose this, you bastard!
Christ, he hit the ground, eh?
Nicht viel, du Trottel. （你也不过如此，你个龟孙。）
Sehr gut. Komm schon …(很好。来吧…)
I'll deal with that last bastard!
我来干掉这最后一个杂种！
Verdammt, ein letzter noch! （该死，还有一个！）
Wir beenden das jetzt …（来了结一下吧…)
Stay down, you piece of shit!
Was soll das werden, Scheißkerl? （怎么啦，王八蛋？）
Das wirst du bereuen! Du Schwein!
Das wirst du bereuen! Du Schwein! （你会付出代价的，狗东西！）
Scheiße! Dafür werde ich dich umbringen!
Scheiße! Dafür werde ich dich umbringen! （操，我会杀了你！）
Arschloch! Auge um Auge! （混蛋，你会付出代价的！）
You won't get away with that, bastard!
You'll die for that, you bastard!
There have been a few saints here, like Mary Magdalene, right?
这里曾经有一些圣人，比如马格达莱妮的玛利亚，对吧？
Was that you? Ah, never mind, then.
You're a wise man, just like Karel was. Thanks to that arrowhead, he'll be with us in spirit forever.
你是个聪明的人，就像卡雷尔一样。感谢这个锋矢，他的灵魂将永远和我们在一起。
Mark, Zwerk, and that poor Kozliek.
马克，兹维克，还有可怜的科兹里克。
But what can I tell you, lad? Each to himself. Besides, they stick with the family when push comes to shove, and you can't say that about everyone.
但我能说什么呢，小伙子？千人千面。而且，到了紧要关头，他们还是会和家人在一起，这点不是所有人都能做到的。
Thanks. That's all I need to know.
谢谢，我想知道的就是这些。
How do I know a good strike from a bad one?
我要怎么区分锤得是好是坏呢？
What good does it do me to whistle while I work?
边打铁边吹口哨有什么好处吗？
But jumping from one end to the other ain't a good idea neither. You'll end up working unevenly.
但东一锤西一锤也不行，这样工件就打不均匀了。
Do it till it turns the colour of straw. Ideally, the colour should be the same everywhere if your forging's going to be even.
把工件加热到呈稻草色就行了。理想的话，要是加热足够均匀，各处颜色都是一致的。
The main thing is don't work it cold. You'd just ruin it.
最要紧的是别在它冷却的时候锤击，那就真成废铁了。
But don't overheat it either. As soon as sparks start to fly off it in the furnace, take it out.
也不要加热过头了。只要看到火星溅出，就把它从熔炉里拿出来吧。
If you keep hammering the same spot, you'll never finish it, you'll just fuck it up.
如果你老锤同一个地方，那你到死都打不成，到头来就是废铁一块。
It makes you work to a rhythm. You won't get tired so quickly, and the iron feels it.
跟着节奏干，你就不太容易累，钢铁也会被你的热情感染。
The best thing to do is aim each strike next to the one before.
最好一锤接着一锤地打。
By the sparks that fly up. And by the ring.
留意飞溅的火星，再听听锤击的声响。
It rings out with a different sound when you do it right.
只要你敲得到位，声音可大不一样。
Notice the shape. The closer you are to finishing, the more precise the shape it will have.
观察工件的形状。越是接近完工，工件的形状就越是精细。
And why do you not settle down, instead of jumping from the frying pan into the fire, gadjo?
那你又为什么不安顿下来，而不是从狼窝跳进虎穴，gadjo（外来人）？
Yay, gadjo. From God, of course!
Yay, gadjo（是的，外来人）。当然是从上帝那里来！
Ko tuke p-hendja? What magic, gadjo?
Ko tuke p-hendja（谁告诉你的）？什么魔法，gadjo（外来人）？
Laches gadjo, mishtes. What can an old woman like me do for you?
Laches gadjo, mishtes（放心，外来人，先生们）。我这样的老妇能为你们做什么呢？
You know, gadjo, nothing and everything...
你知道的，gadjo（外来人），有时候一无所有便是什么都有…
And what makes you nomads different?
你们这些游牧民为何如此与众不同？
Hey, I’d be quite interested to know if Kozliek really is your brother?
嘿，我挺好奇的，科兹里克真是你兄弟吗？
I'm looking for a friend. He's called Capon, I'm sure you'd recognise him. In fact, you saw us both in the pillory, didn't you?
我在找一个朋友。他叫卡蓬，你应该还记得。实际上，你之前应该是在颈手枷上见过我俩，是不是？
How do I get to the nomads' camp?
我应该怎么进入游牧民的营地呢？
How do you get along with the nomads? They don't live that far from here, right?
你们与游牧民关系如何？他们住的离这里不远，对吗？
Excuse me, I'm looking for someone, a friend of mine… Erm, the one who ended up in the pillory with me.
打扰一下，我在找一个人，是我的朋友……嗯，之前和我一起在颈手枷上的那位。
这个管家乌尔里希是谁？
I have the feeling you're not like the other nomads here.
我感觉你不像这里的其他游牧民。
你说的是你的哥哥科兹里克吗？
Why didn't you drive out those nomads ages ago?
你们为什么不早点将那些游牧民赶走？
Why don't you drive those nomads away?
你为什么不把那些游牧民赶走？
Excuse me, I'm looking for the man who was in the pillory with me yesterday. Have you seen him?
打扰一下，我在找昨天和我一起被上了颈手枷的人。你见过他吗？
I'm sorry, but there were no Sons of David in Skalitz where I lived.
抱歉，我生活在斯卡里茨，那里没有大卫的儿子。
Here and there it seems to me that you are almost too clever. You must have been in a monastery, right Kozliek?
在我看来，种种迹象都表明你有时候有点聪明过头了。你肯定在修道院里待过吧，科兹里克？
I grew up in Skalitz, it was a small mining town on the Sasau River. My father was a blacksmith.
我是在斯卡里茨长大的，那是一个在莎邵河旁的采矿小镇。我的父亲曾是一名铁匠。
I wish! I've only sold two or three recently. Most of these here are right old.
帮我个忙！我最近只卖出了两三个。大多数十字架都很旧了。
The sinner then has to erect a conciliation cross to mark the site of his evil deed.
那么罪人就得在自己犯罪的地方立起一个和解十字架。
Compared to what is coming, this is a mere shoving match!
与即将到来的那场相比，现在这不过是小打小闹罢了！
Aye, Jan is simply a man who goes after what he wants with a sword in his hand.
是的，扬就是一个会手持利剑去追求他想要的东西的男人。
Na djanav, maybe. We have wise sayings for everything, gadjo.
Na djanav（我不知道），也许吧。我们有对应万物的智慧谚语，gadjo（外来人）。
Right. But if you do not have anything, you do not pay anything, and nobody will be any the wiser. Bokhaľi ričňi na khelel.
没错。但如果你一无所有，你就不需要支付任何税收，也没有任何人会知道。Bokhali ricni na khelel（光脚不怕穿鞋的）。
So vakeres, gadjo? There is no luck involved.
So vakeres, gadjo（你说什么，外来人？）这和运气无关。
Look, you know what, that sounds like the gadjo we saw in the forest the other night!
嘿，你猜怎么，这听起来像我们前几天晚上在森林里看到的那个gadjo（外来人）！
Loads of people have been in the pillory, and you know what it's like… I'm really busy right now…
上过颈手枷的人多了去了，你也知道为什么…….别烦我，我真的很忙……
Eh, but Herr Otto spends more time in Prague than here, and Chamberlain Ulrich… Ach, lassen wir das.
嗯，但奥托大人在布拉格的时间比在这里更长，管家乌尔里希… Ach, lassen wir das.（没有那个必要）。
How did I become a nomad? It's in my blood. This is my life.
我怎么会变成一个游牧民是吗？这是刻在我骨子里的东西，这是我的命。
Andererseits with a gonne from me, you can be sure it will not go off im deinem Gesicht!
Andererseits（另外），有了我的手铳，你可以确信它不会在你面前（im deinem Gesicht）走火！
Oh, and then our Master Chamberlain Ulrich, oh my God...
哦，然后是我们的管家大人乌尔里希，哦，我的上帝…
I'd like to talk to him too, boy, but he's still in Prague. He's hardly ever here. Chamberlain Ulrich is in charge of things.
孩子，我也想和他谈谈，但他还在布拉格。他很少来这里。这里一切由管家乌尔里希负责。
Yes, yes. It is not close. But such is our life, gadjo.
是的，是的。很漫长。但生活就是这样，Gadjo（外来人）。
Ay, gadjo… It must be a divine punishment, all the worries my children cause me…
唉，gadjo（外来人）……这一定是神降下的惩罚，我的孩子们真是让我操碎了心……
And there's more than poachers depriving the wolves of prey and nomads thieving like magpies.
那里不光有偷窃的游牧民，而且由于偷猎活动猖獗，森林中的狼都跑出来觅食了。
Oh, my God, what are you on about now?! Are you sure you aren't a bit simple? Wasn't one stay in the pillory enough for you?
我的天，你现在又在说什么？！你确定你的脑子正常吗？被关进颈手枷里一次还不够？
Hmm… Skalitz, you say. I must remember that.
嗯…你说的是斯卡里茨。我必须记住这个地方。
I reckon it wasn't a good idea. Stanley's right when he says I'm a nimwit.
我觉得这不是个好主意。斯塔尼克说我是个傻瓜果然是对的。
Thanks for the help, Henry! Once Stanley finds out I beat you, I'm sure he'll leave me alone.
多谢你的帮助，亨利！一旦斯塔尼克发现我打败了你，我确信他不会再烦我了。
You're just the same as Stanley.
你和斯塔尼克是一种人。
Stanley was right, I am getting better.
斯塔尼克说得对，我正在变强。
If I keep going like this, I'll take Stanley down like it's nothing!
这样下去的话，我很快就能打败斯塔尼克了！
No offence, but if you dared go up against Stanley with what you now know, they'd carry you away in a bucket.
无意冒犯，但如果你凭这几下功夫就敢去挑战斯塔尼克，那么你一定会输得很惨。
Drunk and screeching like magpies! To the pillory with the lot of you!
醉醺醺，乱哄哄！你们这群人都该戴上颈手枷！
好呆呆，乖狗狗！给我看看！
I learnt how to shoot a hand cannon. And right away I got to use one in battle...
我学会了怎么用手铳。然后马上就在战斗中用上了……
The longer you are under the influence of Jan Zizka and Hynek of Kunstadt, the more you will be seen as a murderer…
你和扬·杰式卡以及库斯塔特的海尼克为伍越久，就越会被视为杀人犯……
Maybe not in Kuttenberg, but it's how we did it in Skalitz!
也许在库滕堡不是这样的，但我们在斯卡里茨就是这么背的！
I don't know, maybe those poor peasants would still be alive? I thought that bloody massacre in Skalitz taught you what evil looks like.
也许那些可怜的农民就能活下来了？我还以为经历了斯卡里茨那场可怕的大屠杀，你已经知道什么叫作恶了。
Find something better to do and leave Tobias alone.
找点别的事来做吧，别找托比亚斯的麻烦了。
托比亚斯会和你们喝酒？
At least I know I don't have to hold back. People like Stanley should get their teeth bashed in every day.
至少我知道我不必手下留情。斯塔尼克这种人就该每天挨一顿揍。
Beda? No. He's too nice to ever bite anyone, he runs away instead. But Stanley drove him into the corner of the stable.
贝达？没有。它太善良了，从不咬人，而是选择逃跑。但斯塔尼克把它逼到了马厩的角落。
I have to. I have to beat Stanley. So they'll leave me alone.
我必须这样做，我得打败斯塔尼克，这样他们才不会来找我麻烦。
Why the hell did you join Zizka?
你当初为什么要加入杰式卡那边？
There is no prison that can hold me, as you can see. I defeated Zizka in a duel.
你也看到了，什么样的牢房都是关不住我的。我还在决斗中打败了杰式卡。
奥托·冯·波尔高？西格斯蒙德？
Tell me one thing. Why? Why Zizka, why von Bergow? Why choose this life?
我只想知道一件事情，为什么？为什么选择杰式卡和冯·波尔高？为什么要选择这种生活？
Zizka was more cautious and faster than I expected. But you lot weren't too successful either. So just what are we accusing each other of here?
杰式卡比我想的要更为谨慎和行动迅速。不过你们的进展也不怎么顺利。那么我们为何要在这里互相挖苦呢？
Nice try, lad. But I'm staying away from the drink. It's just not worth it.
想得美，小子。但我已下定决心戒酒，才不会为此破例。
祝你好运，斯卡里茨的亨利。
By accident. It was thanks to Jan Zizka.
纯属偶然，这要归功于扬·杰式卡。
Haha! Bleeding like a stuck pig!
哈哈！哈哈！血流得像杀猪一样！
Du bist am Ende! （你死定了！）
Ha, du blutest, hm? （哈，你流血啦？）
哈哈，这下你长记性了吧！
He, dein Arm ist hin. （哈，你胳膊废了）
Don't dare bleed to death before I gut you!
在我给你开膛破肚之前可别死了啊！
Next one will be in your face!
Und jetzt fick dich! （现在给我滚！）
Wir werden dich ausnehmen. （我们会宰了你！）
Go up the stairs to the next floor and then climb the ladder to the attic. That's where you'll find it.
往楼上走，然后顺着梯子爬到阁楼上，你就能看到那个地方了。
Go up the stairs to the next floor and then climb the ladder to the attic. That's where you'll find it.
往楼上走，然后顺着梯子爬到阁楼上，你就能看到那个地方了。
This is a market, so how about we haggle a bit over Kincsem?
这是市场，我们谈谈金克森姆的价钱怎么样？
Svadilfari. I'll pay the full amount for that one.
斯瓦迪尔法利。我会全款买下那匹马。
I'll take Kasztanka. No need to haggle over a beautiful mare like that.
我会带走栗。像它这样漂亮的母马，不需要再讨价还价了。
What can you tell me about Kasztanka?
你能跟我说说栗的情况吗？
Veillantif's a strange name. Sounds rather noble.
韦兰迪夫是一个奇怪的名字，听起来像贵族。
What can you tell me about Crow?
你能跟我说说关于乌鸦的情况吗？
If I take Svadilfari and leave you my horse…
如果我带走斯瓦迪尔法利，把我的马留给你呢……
If I take Kasztanka and leave you my horse, I should get some groschen back, right?
如果我带走栗，留下自己的马，我应该还能拿回一些格罗申，对吗？
I'll take Veillantif, but take the value of my horse off the price.
我要买韦兰迪夫，但它的价格要扣掉我这匹马的价值。
So if we exchange Crow for my horse, you'll make up the difference.
如果我们用乌鸦交换我的马，你该补些差价了。
I'll take Windwurf and leave you my horse.
我会把飓风带走，把我的马儿留给你。
